story:
Introduction

The DC Fitness Community is vibrant, diverse, and full of options, and FitDC is arriving soon to help you choose from these options.  When was the last time you decided to try out a new workout?  How long did it take for you to make that decision and actually get into the class or gym?  With all of the options out there, and multiple locations, schedules, difficulty levels, and prices, beginning a fitness routine, or changing up the one you have can be a research project in itself, and you don’t have time for that!  Welcome to FitDC, the central place to find out about and compare your fitness options.  We’re also here to personally help you sort through these variables to help determine the right fit for you.

Who Is FitDC

FitDC is the brainchild of C.J. Cross. An athlete since childhood, C.J. is passionate about fitness. After graduating with a degree in business and spending several years in a traditional 9-5, while also working other jobs like bartending and database maintenance, C.J. felt drawn back to the world of athletics and so he traded in his suit and tie for a pair of running shorts to become a personal trainer and run coach. Throughout the years, C.J. has helped hundreds of people find their footing in the gym and, through these experiences, learned a great deal about the trials people face when attempting to start new fitness routines. Reflecting on these interactions, C.J. began to conceptualize ways to make this process easier and so FitDC was born.

   

Knowing that a project like this needs a team, C.J. reached out to his network of cohorts and brought together the team of Mia Rommel, Chris Gillyard, Caroline Bogucki, and Colleen Lerro.  Together, along with a dozen or so other fitness professionals and enthusiasts that are now part of the FitDC ambassador core, FitDC is poised to help hundreds--likely thousands-- of people change the course of their health.  Click here to go to our page to learn more about the team.

The Problem

Do us a favor, pop onto your favorite search engine and look up the difference between 3 gyms in your neighborhood.  On second thought, please don’t, because you’ll be gone for half an hour and we don’t want you getting frustrated.  If you decide to attempt a traditional web-search for your ideal gym, you’ll find that no search engine is truly designed to handle the complexities of your search.  That’s where we come in.  We care about fitness and want to make it easier for people to start new routines that will lead to healthier lifestyles, so we are taking on the legwork for you.    

Through FitDC, fitness seekers will be able to use the FitBase to search for the specific fitness services that meet their needs, talk with our fitness advisors to assess goals, and connect directly with the right facility or service provider. 

Fitness professionals, and those that run local facilities, will be able to create and edit FitDC profiles, publish class times and services, and interact with the community.  This way, they can easily share specials, promote new classes, and get a feel for what people are looking for. 

FitDC is an online community for the fitness world, built by fitness insiders to meet the needs of our community, regardless of fitness level.

What Your Help Will Do

We’ve been hard at work building the database, setting up the website design, interacting with members of the community, and learning about what it is that people want and need.  We’re in this to help both fitness seekers and fitness professionals.  Your contributions will be going to help fund database data collection efforts, recruitment of our fitness advisors, and the education of our staff.  For every extra dollar raised, you are contributing to man-hours put towards accelerating a fully updated database and advisory staff.  FitDC is committed to keeping the money local and hiring local fitness professionals and enthusiasts to provide the advice and connect with gyms, studios, and fitness professionals. 

With Your Help

FitDC will be a place where people can find anything health related and fitness professionals will be able to expand their businesses.  We will be offering special events to connect people with the greater fitness community and, through our blog, presenting our community with valuable health and fitness information.

Can’t contribute today?  We would love your help with getting the word out to the world.  Share this page with fitness enthusiasts and fitness newbies.  Register for a free account on our website to get news and updates and to get a chance to get a fitness consultation.  Know a medium or large company that is in need of a wellness program?  Contact us and we’ll get it set up!

Please use the Indiegogo tools to share this with the world!

story:
A Bit About Captain Active and His Show

Captain Active's mission is to show kids and families how much fun they can have being active and eating healthy.  There are too many kids staring at screens, lazying around and eating junk food, so Captain Active's doing something about it!

The Captain Active Awesome Active Adventure Stage Show, is an action packed hour of fun, laughs, music, games, imagination and education for school students.  Captain Active is performing the show at primary schools all over Australia, taking audiences on an incredible mission to overcome the evil and unhealthy habits of his arch nemesis Lazy Cray Cray!

Many large schools have the budget and means to provide the show for their students, however, many small regional and remote schools with less than 100 students aren't as lucky and therefore are missing out.  Your contribution towards this campaign will allow Captain Active to reach the students in these small schools and inspire, motivate and educate them to want to lead an active, healthy lifestyle.


What Your Contribution Will Create

Although Captain Active's primary focus is to encourage kids and families to be active and healthy, he still needs to earn a living, so there is a fee of $5/student for schools to host the Captain Active Awesome Active Stage Show.  The minimum fee to ensure the show is finacially viable for Cap Ac is $500/school*.  This unfortunately disadvantages small schools that have less then 100 students and they either have to pay much more per student or pass up the opportunity of seeing the show.

YOUR FUNDING WILL SUBSIDISE PERFORMANCES AT SMALL SCHOOLS so that these students only pay $5 each, just like at the big schools.  For example, a school with 30 children will pay $150 and contributions from this campaign will pay the balance of $350.  A school with 50 children will pay $250 and be subsidised $250.  This way:
  • Students in small schools get to enjoy and learn from the show
  • They will pay the same amount as students in bigger schools
  • Captain Active will be able to spread his awesome active messages and enthusiasm to all parts of rural and regional Australia
  • Captain Active won't go bankrupt in the process!


The $6,500 budget goal for this campaign will allow Captain Active to visit at least 20 small schools (based on an estimated average of 40 students/school requiring a $300 subsidy) all over Australia!!  That equates to over 800 students, plus teachers, parents and younger siblings in regional and rural parts of Australia, who would otherwise miss out.

[* The cost of $500/school includes travel and accommodation time and expenses, bookings, promotion and administrative costs.  All these tasks are carried out by Captain Active. There are no other funding sources provided for this project]


The Awesome Perks

By contributing to this campaign, you will not only be putting huge smiles on kids' faces and creating lots of awesome active and healthy kids, you'll become a Captain Active Champion and recieve some very cool perks, including:

  • A huge thanks on Cap Ac's social media
  • A laminated and signed A4 photo of Cap Ac and a signed cap
  • A laminated photo and summary of the performance from the school you helped Cap Ac attend
  • A personalised video message from Cap Ac on a topic of your choice
  • Your choice of small school anywhere in Australia for Cap Ac to visit
  • A FREE show for any small school of your choice in Australia

You can't tell me you wouldn't love one (or all) of these!!


Why Planet Earth Needs Captain Active

Our next generation desperately need to be inspired to be active and taught how to be healthy, because:
  • The dollars from major corporations to market fast foods and unhealthy convenience foods is not going to decrease
  • The attraction towards hand held devices and screen technology is going to increase
  • TV shows and interactive computer games are going to continue to entice kids to sit and be sedentary

Captain Active simply wants to show kids how much fun they can have by choosing to get outside and play games; choosing to eat healthy, fresh foods; choosing to climb, ride, jump, paddle, run and swim; and choosing to lead a healthy, balanced lifestyle.


2016 - The Year Ahead

Already for 2016, Captain Active has booked show performances with 15 schools in Queensland, New South Wales and Western Australia. Here is what a school Principal said about the show last year:

"Captain Active engaged our students in a fun, interactive and exciting show. Not only did our students love Captain Active, they were singing his riddles, doing his actions, playing his games and talking about his healthy food messages in the days and weeks following his show. They shared his message with their families, siblings, friends and teachers. We can’t wait to see Captain Active again next year!”

Captain Active also has a school holiday show tour of four regional Queensland towns taking place in January 2016.  Here's what a Mum said about the show performed in Townsville before Christmas:

"LOVED the show! I am putting your name out there to lots of parents as we really value what you are doing. We constantly hear statements like "Does Captain Active eat this" "Is this food healthy" etc from our son which proves how influential you are in his mini world!!  Thanks!"


2015 - A Breakthrough Year

Captain Active has already achieved a lot and is on track for world domination.  In 2015, Captain Active:

  • Appeared on Channel Ten's Shark Tank
  • Became an ambassador for the Live Out Loud Foundation, a charity to reduce childhood obesity, increase children's self esteem and get them active
  • Was an ambassador for the Townsville Running Festival
  • Created and performed the Captain Active Awesome Active Adventure Show at 5 different schools throughout Queensland
  • Visited over 30 kindergartens to get kids active
  • Visited over 15 schools to educate students about being healthy
  • Attended over 15 community events
  • Got a huge number of kids being active through the Captain Active Kids Classes and outdoor family adventures
  • Appeared on multiple television news reports, in a number of radio interviews, featured in newspaper articles and was larger than life on a roadside billboard
  • Chosen as one of Townsville's top 25 community heroes
  • Built a significant online following through social media
Captain Active is pumped, motivated, excited and ready and raring to make 2016 even better...


If You Can't Contribute $$

Captain Active will completely understand if you're not in a financial position to contribute to his campaign, after all, unlike some of Captain Active's favourite foods, like mangoes, apples, peaches, oranges and avocados, money doesn't grow on trees!

If you like the look of what I am working towards achieving and agree that getting kids to be more active and healthy is important, please let you friends know about Captain Active.  His website is www.captainactive.com.au and he's on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and YouTube.  There are also lots of ways to share information from this page.

Even better than this though, is to get out there, set a great example for our next generation and have fun being active, just like Captain Active!

story:
Summary

Organic food - We think we know what it is. With sales reaching £1.86 billion in the UK in 2014. Do we, as a nation, actually know what we're buying? Why are we paying the extra money? We're told it's better for us and less damaging to the environment, but is this the truth?

There is no denying it; organic food is everywhere, taking over meat, vegetables, fruit and even cosmetic goods. With shoppers spending an extra £1.4 million a week on organic products in the UK alone, isn’t it time we asked ourselves what the difference really is? 

In this 15 minute, content packed documentary, our presenter will investigate what qualities food and products have to possess to be classed as organic. We will follow the journey from the beginning of seed production and plantation, and continue through to the crops harvest. We’ll discover exactly how the farmland is kept, how our food is produced, and investigate what is added, or not added, to our food in the development process.

We will be speaking to a wide range of farmers who grow an abundance of crops and discussing their experience with organic farming as well as conventional farming. We’ll be comparing the two techniques and discovering whether the difference in farming practices makes a healthier and higher quality product for consumption that is worth paying more money for. 

What We Need & What You Get

As a vegan and a inspiring documentary filmmaker this is a project that I am hugely passionate about.

However to make this film to the best quality it can, I need to raise some funds to support the different finances required for the production which are:

  • Transport costs between locations for the crew and cast.
  • Feeding crew and cast for the duration of the shoot.
  • Accommodation for crew and presenter during the 4 days of shooting. 
  •  Transcribers for the many interviews.
  • Graphics and editorial fees.
I am asking for any spare change you might have to donate to contribute to my budget. Anything you can give will be greatly appreciated. 

The Impact

We’re all on the look out to learn how to stay healthy and with the increase of organic foods appearing on our supermarket shelves. The public are becoming ever more curious as to what organic food is and why they should spend the extra money on it. We want to uncover the truth that the public and everyday consumer deserves to know. 

Our Challenge

We want to create a honest representation of the organic industry: this requires us to travel around England to find the best possible contributors who are considered experts in their industries. This takes time and money, so it is vital that we receive funding to help this project.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are interested in the project but can't spare any change, you can still help the project out by:

  • Sharing this page and encouraging your friends, family and social networking followers to support the project.
  • Follow and share our Twitter page @organictruthdoc
Thank you for taking the time for reading our campaign its appreciated by everyone on the project.

story:
Our kits allow backers to test the various core components of beard oil (carrier oils) on their beards. Once you know what works, you can use carrier oils as single-ingredient beard oils, design your own beard oils, or seek out beard oils that feature carrier oils that work for you. 

Carrier oils do more than their name implies, they are an active ingredient, doing most of the hard work of keeping your beard healthy, happy, and under control. Ask anyone who makes their own beard oil and they'll rant and rave about the benefits of their favorite carrier oils.

Wikipedia does an excellent job of defining what carrier oils are, even if they do fail to emphasize their role in beard oil formulas. - Wikipedia Link

The job of carrier oils, and beard oils for that matter, is to serve as a substitute for your beard's natural sebum oil.  Sebum is an oily substance produced by sebaceous glands that coats, moisturizes, and protects your skin and hair. Beards just don't produce enough of it and that why beard oil is such a necessity for us beardsmen. 

Just because we made up the term "single-ingredient beard oil" doesn't mean it's a new thing.

 Because carrier oils are the unscented workhorses of the beard oil industry, many bearded men turn to them as a money-saving substitute/alternative to pricey beard oils. Which is why we like to call them "single-ingredient beard oils."

Beard oils mimic the natural sebum oils produced by the skin, and are composed mainly of carrier oils and essential oils. - Wikipedia Link

Generally speaking, a beard oil is any combination of two or more carrier and essential oils used to moisturize and soften beard hair and skin. A single-ingredient beard oil is any one carrier oil being used as a beard oil. 

Early backers will help us decide which carrier oils go into the Bearded Roots Test Kits. We'll be digging into specific carrier oils in our Updates as the campaign progresses.

Carrier Oils Included in Kit • Fractionated Coconut Oil • Jojoba Oil • Argan Oil • Sweet Almond Oil • Hemp Seed Oil • Meadowfoam Seed Oil • Grapeseed Oil • Avocado Seed Oil

Rewards 

Remaining Rewards: 8-packs

Included in the Bearded Roots Test Kits (8-pack)

• 100% Pure Carrier Oil Samples (10 ml bottles w/ restrictor caps)

• Demo Sheets to Track Results

• Trees Planted in Your Name

• + Add-ons (combs)

1 tree is planted for every bottle of carrier oil in our test kits. The 4-pack plants 4 trees. To learn more about the carrier oils watch for updates.

Carrier Oil Options • Fractionated Coconut Oil • Jojoba Oil • Argan Oil • Sweet Almond Oil • Hemp Seed Oil • Meadowfoam Seed Oil • Avocado Seed Oil • Grape Seed Oil

The Naturally Normal Pocket Comb was designed as a compostable alternative to disposable plastic combs. This reward plants 5 TREES. 4 for the oils and 1 for the combs.

The Tree-mendous Folding Comb is a durable, long-lasting comb made from sustainably sourced green sandalwood. This reward plants 6 TREES! 4 for the oils and 2 for the comb.

1 tree is planted for every bottle of carrier oil in our test kits. The 6-pack plants 6 trees.

This reward plants 7 TREES! 6 for the oils and 1 for the combs.

This reward plants 8 TREES! 6 for the oils and 2 for the comb.

* The Re‑Tee is made from 100% recycled & reclaimed materials that otherwise would end up in a landfill. 5 trees are planted for every t-shirt we sell. Colors may vary depending on availability.

Unboxing

Dan C Bearded was tree-mendous enough to unbox one of our kits on his YouTube channel. If you want to learn about beard oils, beard products, or just beard life, Dan's your man. 

We promise that our products will always be constructed from sustainably sourced, forest-friendly materials, we will never-ever sell anything without planting a tree, and we will work environmental awareness into all aspects of our devotion to beards.

Our Mission: to make the bearded world a greener place; through reforestation, reducing plastic waste, promoting environmental awareness, entertaining people, and by fundamentally challenging what's expected from the beard industry.

Why Trees?

Trees are more than just a good fit for a beard company. Trees clean our air and water, create habitats for biodiversity, contribute to our health and wellbeing, and create jobs for social impact all around the globe.

We care deeply about the planet and creating a business that gives back to the great outdoors and the wild places in this world – that’s why we've partnered with One Tree Planted to plant at least one tree for every item we produce.

Reforestation Projects ? One Tree Planted

Proudly partnered with One Tree Planted. – www.onetreeplanted.org

 Green Beard Grmng is on a beardly mission to reforest the planet one beard at a time! We've partnered with One Tree Planted, a non-profit environmental charity on a mission of global reforestation. They have ongoing reforestation projects across the globe providing us with the opportunity to plant trees where they are most needed. 

The North American fire season is in full swing this summer and we've decided to shift our reforestation efforts from Australia to closer to home. Our backers will help us decide where the trees from this Kickstarter campaign will be planted. 

Through One Tree Planted's partnerships with the U.S. Forest Service, U.S. State Forest and Conservation District, we are able to plant trees in many regions across the United States, including California, Colorado, Florida and Oregon. Our backers will help us decide where we plant trees.

Trees clean our air and water, create habitats for biodiversity, contribute to our health and wellbeing, and create jobs for social impact all around the globe.We care deeply about the planet and creating a business that gives back to the great outdoors and the wild places in this world – that’s why we've partnered with One Tree Planted to plant at least one tree for every item we produce.Reforestation Projects ? They have ongoing reforestation projects across the globe providing us with the opportunity to plant trees where they are most needed. The North American fire season is in full swing this summer and we've decided to shift our reforestation efforts from Australia to closer to home. Our backers will help us decide where the trees from this Kickstarter campaign will be planted. Through One Tree Planted's partnerships with the U.S. Forest Service, U.S. State Forest and Conservation District, we are able to plant trees in many regions across the United States, including California, Colorado, Florida and Oregon. story:
I had to roll over my initial campaign becase I didn't know know  how to to use the website.  I am hopeful that a better future awaits.  My Son Johnny And I are FREEZING!  It is below Zero in Michigan and a tiny space heater is doing nothing! We need help!!!  This is a campaign to meet the basic needs of A young child and his  sick mom.  The Basic Need TO have a Warm Safe Place to live. That's all we Need.  Moving Costs.  Please Do all you can To Help This Urgent situation!  It is -15% outside.   Johnny and I don't want to lose all our stuff and go to a dangerous shelter to stay warm.   We've been praying for some miracle so we can just move. If YOU are reading this You have power to Do something Great and I assure you that although I cant pay you back' You will be blessed  for helping  in anyway even if its just getting my story to someone that has the financial means to contribute.  Every dollar add's up so no contribution is too small. If 1000 people gave only $1.00 that would be  $1,000. which is 50% of my goal!   

  I am a single Mom that has been battling Severe Chronic Migraine Disease For 7 Years and other Chronic illness.  My full story , The Migraine Hostage is featured on Migraine.com.  I went from being a married  educated mom living a middle class life to being a Educated single mom living in poverty and barely able to function to take care of myself and son's needs. We are living in a foreclosed home with NO HEAT, Major Electrical ,Plumbing, and Structural problems!!! The temperature in Michigan goes below 0%  many  winter nights.  I have a couple of space heaters that have increased the electric bill to almost $400 while doing very little to  warm the house.  Being cold and trying to figure out HOW to fix this situation on my own when I cant work and im in severe pain and cold.   Most people are not aware that Migraines are not just a "headache".  Migraine is a Neurological Disease and can cause great impairment and for some, like me unfortunately  Complete Disability! I am  bedridden every other Day  My doctor feels it is imperative that my living situation improves before I lose the ability to raise my son at all, due to increased and worsening symptoms.  YOU Can help to stop this downward spiral for Me and my 11 year old Son.  All the money I raise will go to moving into a Warm safe place and starting alternative treatment,  as I can NOT add more medication!  I have additional chronic diseases including Asthma and Arthritis of the Neck, but none so disabling and painful as the Chronic Migraines.

I really would also love to educate about the myths of Migraines because their are many.  It can be  very isolating and damaging to relationships , careers and quality of life.  My full story about My experience with migraine Disease is featured on migraine.com and titled The Migraine Hostage.  Once i can get off one of the medications that has turned my brain into oatmeal'  I want to write a book because people have no idea and do not understand that migraineurs can not just pop a advil and get on with it.

Other Ways You Can Help

Every little bit helps so I humbly accept any financial contributions to assist me . 

Some people just can’t contribute  but there is Always Something Someone can do! Like post the campaign on social media and help spread the word.  Due to the illness' I am quite isolated so any help with using indiegogo tools and the internet would help me get my story out. Please Like and Share on FaceBook and help spread the word.   Email and text Friends and Family and ask them to look at my story.  Thank You so Very Much!!!
story_txt: I had to roll over my initial campaign becase I didn't know know  how to to use the website.  I am hopeful that a better future awaits.  My Son Johnny And I are FREEZING!  It is below Zero in Michigan and a tiny space heater is doing nothing! We need help!!!  This is a campaign to meet the basic needs of A young child and his  sick mom.  The Basic Need TO have a Warm Safe Place to live. That's all we Need.  Moving Costs.  Please Do all you can To Help This Urgent situation!  It is -15% outside.   Johnny and I don't want to lose all our stuff and go to a dangerous shelter to stay warm.   We've been praying for some miracle so we can just move. If YOU are reading this You have power to Do something Great and I assure you that although I cant pay you back' You will be blessed  for helping  in anyway even if its just getting my story to someone that has the financial means to contribute.  Every dollar add's up so no contribution is too small. If 1000 people gave only $1.00 that would be  $1,000. which is 50% of my goal!      I am a single Mom that has been battling Severe Chronic Migraine Disease For 7 Years and other Chronic illness.  My full story , The Migraine Hostage is featured on Migraine.com.  I went from being a married  educated mom living a middle class life to being a Educated single mom living in poverty and barely able to function to take care of myself and son's needs. We are living in a foreclosed home with NO HEAT, Major Electrical ,Plumbing, and Structural problems!!! The temperature in Michigan goes below 0%  many  winter nights.  I have a couple of space heaters that have increased the electric bill to almost $400 while doing very little to  warm the house.  Being cold and trying to figure out HOW to fix this situation on my own when I cant work and im in severe pain and cold.   Most people are not aware that Migraines are not just a "headache".  Migraine is a Neurological Disease and can cause great impairment and for some, like me unfortunately  Complete Disability! I am  bedridden every other Day  My doctor feels it is imperative that my living situation improves before I lose the ability to raise my son at all, due to increased and worsening symptoms.  YOU Can help to stop this downward spiral for Me and my 11 year old Son.  All the money I raise will go to moving into a Warm safe place and starting alternative treatment,  as I can NOT add more medication!  I have additional chronic diseases including Asthma and Arthritis of the Neck, but none so disabling and painful as the Chronic Migraines.I really would also love to educate about the myths of Migraines because their are many.  It can be  very isolating and damaging to relationships , careers and quality of life.  My full story about My experience with migraine Disease is featured on migraine.com and titled The Migraine Hostage.  Once i can get off one of the medications that has turned my brain into oatmeal'  I want to write a book because people have no idea and do not understand that migraineurs can not just pop a advil and get on with it.Other Ways You Can HelpEvery little bit helps so I humbly accept any financial contributions to assist me . Some people just can’t contribute  but there is Always Something Someone can do! Like post the campaign on social media and help spread the word.  Due to the illness' I am quite isolated so any help with using indiegogo tools and the internet would help me get my story out. Please Like and Share on FaceBook and help spread the word.   Email and text Friends and Family and ask them to look at my story.  Thank You so Very Much!!!

story:
Manhattan’s first kosher wine bar integrates authentic Moroccan design with the finest kosher wine, beer, original cocktails and cutting edge hot bites.

The Cellar invites you to become a part of the family and join us in hosting friends in our home, Darna.

As members of the Cellar family we would like to offer you exclusive discounts on our wines and beers.

The Cellar door is open every night at 10 pm starting May 15th at 600 Columbus avenue (& 89th street).

story:
Our Story

Hi my name is Melvin Williams; I was born and raised in Los Angeles, CA. Iâ€™ve been a fan of sports all my life.  What I most admire about sports is the competitive nature, feeling like Iâ€™m part of organization representing my city. I consider myself down to earth, easy going, love all sports, family oriented, church going and try to participate in all the positive things in life.  My most satisfying is  trying to find ways to help other.

 

  • I would like to build an all sports fan team with the help of all the fans around the world.

  • As sports fans we congratulate the team performance so they know that we are always there for them.  We tell our teams how their work touches our hearts and motivates us.

  • As fans we become season ticket holders, dedicate years out of our lives to support the organization, favorite teams and its players no matter what the outcome Fans have gone to great lengths to show their appreciation and loyalty.  Fans, appreciated the struggles of their teams, the wins, and loses etc.

  • But lets face it Fans are typically powerless , or have no say when owner, players and commissioners decided what they think is best for the teams without asking us for our opinion.

  • I would like to start an all sports fan base across the US, so that we as fans have a voice to protect the fans investments in sports. And can be at the bargaining table when things are going down hill for some reason.

  • Its time for fans to unite together as 1 and have a voice.  Its not about the team you love and support this is about the fans being heard and acknowledge.

  • If you think about it at the end of the day the fans is who makes the sports world go around.

The Impact

  •   Is to have an elected fan from each state, to represent their state. 

  • We as fans will no longer have a quiet voice and feel unappreciated as fans.

  • Without fans there would be no teams, owners or contracts.

Our Goals

To get enough fans around the world on board to get behind this. USA Fans Dream Team. In my life time I would love to see when a professional teams discuss a lockout that the USA Fans Dream Team would have enough voice to disrupt any talks of a lock out.  To make this very simple the teams would need the buy in of the fans all around the world before the lockout can happen.  It would no longer tolerated that fans have to idly stand by and take whatâ€™s given to them by the teams, (because apologizing and saying we are sorry will not be enough for the fans).  I have so many more ideas and goals for USA Fans Dream Team.

  • To list hereâ€™s one idea; I would like every professional sports team to have a drawing for 4 top of the line seats, food and drinks made available for fans at every game including playoffs.

Face it, thatâ€™s a drop in the bucket for the owners.  So letâ€™s not wait for the next discussion or lockout to take place.

 

A contribution of $1 will help make this dream a reality for all professional sports fans around the world. $1 may seem to be a small donation, but with all the sports fans around the world can make this dream a reality. Your donations is a start of your voice being heard.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word among your Facebook and Twitter friends, family co-workers, while sitting on the bus or riding in a carpool and/or any other medium that will reach people - don't forget to use the share button on this web site! Contributing is very easy - you can use a credit or debit card, or a PayPal account. I wish to thank everyone in advance for your contribution.

 

Thank you,

 

Melvin Williams

story:
NEUROPLANNERs are also available locally in Singapore at We The People Store, Hong Kong at the Backer Store, and Philippines at Inside the Box Cafe.  We'll be coming to new stores in Malaysia, United States, and Taiwan soon.  Look out for us as well in some exhibition stalls around Melbourne soon.

 

New year, new you.

It's the first week of the year and you've ticked most of your goals.  You've eaten right, learned how to code, and been going to the gym.  Then, you went missing.  Three weeks later, your friends find you deep into the season finale of a 7-part series that you only started 3 days ago with pizzas and nachos spread on your couch.

 

Sounds like you? 

Every year you make a promise to yourself that you'll finally get that promotion or at least make time for your crocheting. But down the road in 2 weeks or 6 months, you stray.  You then start some existential crisis questions over a bottle of red either with friends or in front of a mirror, upside-down naked.  You rack your brain for motivation, clarity, and focus but you felt bled out from boredom, tiredness, and stress.

 

Fret not.  You are not alone. 

There are many of us who seems not to be as energized as our marathon finisher colleagues or who-seem-to-have-achieve-it-all friends.  I can say for sure that you are not mental and that you've come to the right place.   You only need to know how to hack your brain to finally make it work alongside you - together in achieving goals, and not how you usually think it does: against it. 

 

Time for a brain workout.   

Imagine knowing the secrets of the world and using it to your advantage.  That is what NEUROPLANNER is about: discovering how your brain ticks.  By knowing how your mind works, the better you plan your actions towards the realization of your goals.

Exploring your brain's capacity takes time as that is how our minds work: they thrive in the slow.  That is why when you take drastic changes (does new year resolutions ring a bell?), it usually does not work out in the long term.  Taking time to learn and practice is key to changing your habits.  So we've designed a year-long planner that gets you through these vital life themes:

Each week, you'll learn basic neuroscience concepts and evidence-based techniques that will put your life back in order.  You'll finally stop beating yourself up for things you thought are your fault but, in fact, you can do better.  Most importantly, you'll make an amazing discovery on how to make yourself happy from within without a need for booze, a pill, or bad company.

You deserve these mindblowing features.

You've made it this far because you need a brilliant tool to catch up with your aspirations and dreams. You'll need power features that are lightweight to be carried at all times while still matching your style.  This planner is packed with the smarts in both content and design:

Get your head around these clever pages.

https://issuu.com/neuroplanner/docs/neuroplanner_sneak_peak_79b386d975f38e

 

We ship worldwide starting 29th Jan 2018

  • Worldwide 10-20 business days depending on destination country
  • Local United States and Singapore 5-10 business days depending on locality
  • Express shipping not available

 

Future thinking.

Our crowdfunding campaign will secure inventory for retail and fund the development stage of our next project: On A Happy Note.

story:
•  Setup your wecount 

 

  • Choose your workout course

 

  •  Work out following the course 

 

Wecount simulates the professional equipment found in gyms, such as the rowing machine, barbells, stationary bicycle and more. It allows you to complete full-body workouts using over 100 different exercises. Customize your workouts with easily adjustable resistance bands to provide the perfect amount of resistance for any fitness level.

 

  • Discover Classes You’ll Love

For $0/month, access a growing action library of classes all on the free Wecount app—including tailored courses. You will find detailed workout courses to target 6 major muscle groups including hips, chest, back, legs and even full body workouts.  Set your goals, choose your course, follow the AI instruction and achieve fitness.

 

  • Your Workout Tracker

Analyze and Improve： Track every strength of your rep, analyze your workout data, and adjust to maximize results.

 

Easy planning and tracking: Reps setting & Daily workout goals.

 

Our all-in-one app provides you with a fully connected exercise experience, you can choose a specific exercise for the muscle group you want to train, or work the entire body.

  • Super Adjustable Weight Resistance

Wecount uses bands that provide from 20 up to 40 pounds of resistance, a total resistance force of 200lbs, which is an appropriate resistance value for most people, even beginners.  This simple yet effective system lets you work out different muscle groups with many different exercises over a wide range of muscle-building resistance.

 

Simply attach the resistance bands to the workout bar, then increase or decrease the exercise difficulty by shortening or lengthening the resistance bands or combine them to get the desired resistance.  

 

  •  High-quality Resistance Bands 

Unlike the other resistance bands on the market, Wecount has a new design of resistance bands, it's lighter but stronger. Each band can stretch up to 5 times its own length. 

 

 

With a compact yet portable size, you can keep Wecount stored in a closet or under a bed and have it set up and ready to go in minutes. With the included travel kit, you can pack lightly and get a great workout without taking the larger work platform.

 

The travel kit makes it easy to take Wecount along on work trips, vacations, office breaks, trail runs, hikes, hotels, and adventures. You get a great workout in the comfort of your own home or anywhere that life takes you.

 

Wecount doesn’t take up much space, you can easily put it under your bed.

 

Easily set up Wecount in one minute, You can enjoy awesome workouts without being stuck in a regular gym. Save time, eliminate costly gym fees and get your workout done quicker with Wecount.

Resistance Bands: help you burn more calories quicker and are easier on your joints than free-weights!

 

Smart Tracker: track your workout data and view your fitness achievements over time.

 

With the built-in smart sensor, it transfers your workout data to the App on your phone.

 

Door Anchor: anchor to any door, rafter, beam, tree, pole or post that supports 200 lbs. to provide more workout options.

 

Handles: built for comfort and durability. Designed for standing and floor based exercises.

 

Founded in 2013, Wecount is a company focusing on the design and manufacture of smart fitness equipment. We are on a mission to promote healthy & balanced lifestyles and believe that motivation and self-discipline are the most important ways to achieve it. To do so, we provide efficient and smart products to our customers to help them overcome obstacles and become their own heroes.

story:
The Dream Origin

The inception of the dream began when my visa ended my career as a successful Strength and Conditioning coach in the United States and I had to move back to my home country of Poland. Strength and Conditioning is in my DNA and in my years in the US, I saw my programs transform the athletes I worked with physically and emotionally. Seeing this progress created the desire to facilitate this same progress in my own community.

With my good friend Artur of many years, we started Strength and Conditioning Education Center (SCEC). The organization is designed to share our knowledge and experience around proper training, nutrition and an overall healthy lifestyle. We train athletes, publish our own athletic performance and fitness articles and instructional videos. To further expand our reach, we hold certification courses to teach other coaches these tools. We have been lucky to have our own space to train and educate, however, this 850 square feet facility quickly became limiting. With the high costs to own a bigger facility, renovate and purchase additional equipment, we knew we wouldn’t be able to do it on our own.

Who Are We

Miroslaw "Mirek" Babiarz - graduated with a Master’s degree in Kinesiology and Sport Psychology from Temple University. His professional certifications include: Certified Strength and Conditioning Specialist (CSCS), Certified Performance Enhancement Specialist (PES) and Certified Sports Performance Coach (USAW). 

Mirek has extensive experience as an athletic coach. He worked at Mercer County College as an Assistant Strength and Conditioning Coach, focusing on designing programs and training soccer, basketball and baseball teams. He continued his tenure as an Assistant Strength and Conditioning Coach at Temple University where he was responsible for 14 sports teams ranging from basketball to tennis. (men and women). Later, he became the Head Strength and Conditioning Coach at the University of Redlands in California where he was responsible for the design and implementation of strength and conditioning protocols for all 21 athletic teams. Personally, Mirek played collegiate basketball in the United States and professionally in Poland for a few years.

Artur Pacek -  Artur received his Physical Education degree from the University in Gorzow Wielkopolski, Poland. His professional certifications include: Certified Speed and Agility Coach (CSAC), Functional Movement Screen Specialist (FMS), and Certified Fitness Nutrition Specialist (FNS). He is also a member of the National Strength and Conditioning Association, as well as the founder and co-owner of Get Better, a company that does organizes basketball camps for professional players in Poland.

Artur expanded his strength and conditioning knowledge in Chicago at Attack Athletics with world renowned trainer Tim Grover, who worked with the likes of Michael Jordan and Dwayne Wade. Artur was able to further his experience by traveling to the 2012 Olympic Games where he worked alongside Grover, assisting in training the USA basketball team. His final stop in the United States was as an assistant coach at the University of Redlands where he designed program and trained athletes for football, baseball, basketball, tennis, soccer and swimming. Currently, he is the Head Strength and Conditioning Coach for the Polish professional basketball team, the Rosa Radom.

 

Our Ask & Your Gift

Your support will help us move to a bigger and better facility and provide it with the very best equipment ranging from free weights and barbells, to squat racks, squat stands, and dumbbells. Plus, an area for warmup, cool down and recovery as well as an athletic turf for sled-pushes, agility, plyometric and sprint training. The new facility will be about 3000 - 4000 square feet and the proposed design is shown below. 

 

Detailed breakdown of the following:

Total budget needed: Minimum $20,000.00

a) Equipment: $10,000.00 - $12,000.00 – barbells, weight plates, dumbbells, squat racks, squat stands, foam rollers, bands, sleds, prowlers, sleds, medicine balls, benches and others. 

 b) Facility Renovation: $3,000.00 - $5,000.00 – multipurpose flooring, artificial turf, bathroom and lockers renovation, painting etc. 

 c) 2-3 months of rent plus utilities: $3,000.00 - $5,000.00

d) Miscellaneous: $2,000.00 - $3,000.00 - sound system, first aid kit, AED, fire extinguisher, water fountain, office supplies etc. 

For your donations you will be receiving great gifts including personalized training programs to achieve your own performance goals, nutrition and supplement advice, Skype/phone/email consultations as well as merchandise such as T-shirts and wristbands. 

 

Services We Offer

As you can see, our tiny 850 square foot facility gets overcrowded during training sessions and during workshops and seminars. 

Specific training groups and services of SCEC include:

  • Individualized sports performance training for the amateur and the professional athlete – specifically designed to accommodate each athlete based on age, level of experience, previous injuries and sport played.                                                                         
  • Group sports performance training for teams and/or mixed athletes – this service is designed to accommodate teams or groups of athletes training together.
  • Group boot camp training for non-athletes – this training service will focus on regular population clients whose desire is to train in a group environment.
  • Individualized personal training for non-athletes – all regular population clients will have an opportunity to train 1 on 1 and receive full attention from the staff.
  • Performance evaluations – all athletes and all clients that are interested will receive a complete sports performance evaluation that includes body composition analysis, movement mechanics analysis and static assessment analysis. 
  • Nutrition/Supplement plan – all clients that are interested will receive a nutrition and supplement plan based on individual needs.
  • Certification courses and workshops – organizing different events, conferences and training clinics/workshops about sports performance.                                                                       

 

The Impact and The Perks 

Simply put, helping us succeed in our dream of building new SCEC facility will directly affect thousands of others achieve their dreams. This is our purpose in life and we whole heartedly appreciate any support we receive. There is nothing like seeing an athlete leave our facility as a high performing athlete and person.

Not only are you getting some great perks for your donations, including personalized training programs, nutrition and supplement advice, Skype or in person consultations, t-shirts and wristbands but your donations are going to directly impact hundreds of lives and make many athletes' dreams come true.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some reading this may not be able to help financially, however, word of mouth is extremely valuable in today’s world. We ask if you could share this with friends and family to help further our reach of our dream and our community’s dream. Together, we all can succeed.

 

Testimonials

Ever since I started to train at SCEC I feel a lot stronger for the full 90 minutes of the game and my acceleration is much better. I recommend SCEC to all football (soccer) players who want to reach their full potential. 

Yannick Sambea Kakoko – football (soccer)– midfielder for Arka Gdynia

Throughout my career I never did strength training. SCEC made me realize and taught me all the positives that come with properly designed weight training and olympic lifting program. Because of that I increased my much needed power and endurance. 

Marcin Chabowski – track and field - long distance runner 

SCEC thought me that rehabilitation means nothing without properly implemented strength training. Great strength result and awesome progress in all physical components couldn't be possible without SCEC.

Mateusz Piechowski – handball – circle runner for Wisła Płock

Training at SCEC is a great way to achieve your performance goals. Confidence in the cage, more endurance, less injuries are only few of many benefits of working with these experienced coaches.

  

Kacper Bróździak – MMA figther 

I was able to see significant gains in my athleticism, from flexibility, to strength, and speed. I was able to not only get stronger but also increase my muscle endurance and overall stamina.

Kevin Russell – American football – quarterback for Pakenham Silverbacks (formerly University of Redlands) 

I am extremely thankful because I learned how to train properly, what exercises are best, what to do and most importantly what not to do and finally how to eat properly. Exercise selection is unique and knowledge is above and beyond other strength & conditioning coaches.

Jakub Dłoniak - basketball - shooting guard for TBV Start Lublin

I am extremely grateful for the training that enabled me to get ready for the Major League Soccer SuperDraft combine in 2014. I was able to come in 2nd place in vertical jump, 5th place in 30 meter sprint and 10th place in 5-10-5 agility test out of the players tested during the combine.

Richie Marquez – football (soccer) – center back for the Philadelphia Union

 

THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT
story_txt:
The Dream Origin
The inception of the dream began when my visa ended my career as a successful Strength and Conditioning coach in the United States and I had to move back to my home country of Poland. Strength and Conditioning is in my DNA and in my years in the US, I saw my programs transform the athletes I worked with physically and emotionally. Seeing this progress created the desire to facilitate this same progress in my own community.

With my good friend Artur of many years, we started Strength and Conditioning Education Center (SCEC). The organization is designed to share our knowledge and experience around proper training, nutrition and an overall healthy lifestyle. We train athletes, publish our own athletic performance and fitness articles and instructional videos. To further expand our reach, we hold certification courses to teach other coaches these tools. We have been lucky to have our own space to train and educate, however, this 850 square feet facility quickly became limiting. With the high costs to own a bigger facility, renovate and purchase additional equipment, we knew we wouldn’t be able to do it on our own.
Who Are We

Miroslaw "Mirek" Babiarz - graduated with a Master’s degree in Kinesiology and Sport Psychology from Temple University. His professional certifications include: Certified Strength and Conditioning Specialist (CSCS), Certified Performance Enhancement Specialist (PES) and Certified Sports Performance Coach (USAW). 
Mirek has extensive experience as an athletic coach. He worked at Mercer County College as an Assistant Strength and Conditioning Coach, focusing on designing programs and training soccer, basketball and baseball teams. He continued his tenure as an Assistant Strength and Conditioning Coach at Temple University where he was responsible for 14 sports teams ranging from basketball to tennis. (men and women). Later, he became the Head Strength and Conditioning Coach at the University of Redlands in California where he was responsible for the design and implementation of strength and conditioning protocols for all 21 athletic teams. Personally, Mirek played collegiate basketball in the United States and professionally in Poland for a few years.

Artur Pacek -  Artur received his Physical Education degree from the University in Gorzow Wielkopolski, Poland. His professional certifications include: Certified Speed and Agility Coach (CSAC), Functional Movement Screen Specialist (FMS), and Certified Fitness Nutrition Specialist (FNS). He is also a member of the National Strength and Conditioning Association, as well as the founder and co-owner of Get Better, a company that does organizes basketball camps for professional players in Poland.
Artur expanded his strength and conditioning knowledge in Chicago at Attack Athletics with world renowned trainer Tim Grover, who worked with the likes of Michael Jordan and Dwayne Wade. Artur was able to further his experience by traveling to the 2012 Olympic Games where he worked alongside Grover, assisting in training the USA basketball team. His final stop in the United States was as an assistant coach at the University of Redlands where he designed program and trained athletes for football, baseball, basketball, tennis, soccer and swimming. Currently, he is the Head Strength and Conditioning Coach for the Polish professional basketball team, the Rosa Radom.
 

Our Ask & Your Gift
Your support will help us move to a bigger and better facility and provide it with the very best equipment ranging from free weights and barbells, to squat racks, squat stands, and dumbbells. Plus, an area for warmup, cool down and recovery as well as an athletic turf for sled-pushes, agility, plyometric and sprint training. The new facility will be about 3000 - 4000 square feet and the proposed design is shown below. 
 
Detailed breakdown of the following:
Total budget needed: Minimum $20,000.00
a) Equipment: $10,000.00 - $12,000.00 – barbells, weight plates, dumbbells, squat racks, squat stands, foam rollers, bands, sleds, prowlers, sleds, medicine balls, benches and others. 
 b) Facility Renovation: $3,000.00 - $5,000.00 – multipurpose flooring, artificial turf, bathroom and lockers renovation, painting etc. 
 c) 2-3 months of rent plus utilities: $3,000.00 - $5,000.00
d) Miscellaneous: $2,000.00 - $3,000.00 - sound system, first aid kit, AED, fire extinguisher, water fountain, office supplies etc. 
For your donations you will be receiving great gifts including personalized training programs to achieve your own performance goals, nutrition and supplement advice, Skype/phone/email consultations as well as merchandise such as T-shirts and wristbands. 
 
Services We Offer

As you can see, our tiny 850 square foot facility gets overcrowded during training sessions and during workshops and seminars. 

Specific training groups and services of SCEC include:


Individualized sports performance training for the amateur and the professional athlete – specifically designed to accommodate each athlete based on age, level of experience, previous injuries and sport played.                                                                         

Group sports performance training for teams and/or mixed athletes – this service is designed to accommodate teams or groups of athletes training together.

Group boot camp training for non-athletes – this training service will focus on regular population clients whose desire is to train in a group environment.

Individualized personal training for non-athletes – all regular population clients will have an opportunity to train 1 on 1 and receive full attention from the staff.

Performance evaluations – all athletes and all clients that are interested will receive a complete sports performance evaluation that includes body composition analysis, movement mechanics analysis and static assessment analysis. 

Nutrition/Supplement plan – all clients that are interested will receive a nutrition and supplement plan based on individual needs.

Certification courses and workshops – organizing different events, conferences and training clinics/workshops about sports performance.                                                                       

 
The Impact and The Perks 

Simply put, helping us succeed in our dream of building new SCEC facility will directly affect thousands of others achieve their dreams. This is our purpose in life and we whole heartedly appreciate any support we receive. There is nothing like seeing an athlete leave our facility as a high performing athlete and person.
Not only are you getting some great perks for your donations, including personalized training programs, nutrition and supplement advice, Skype or in person consultations, t-shirts and wristbands but your donations are going to directly impact hundreds of lives and make many athletes' dreams come true.


 
Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that some reading this may not be able to help financially, however, word of mouth is extremely valuable in today’s world. We ask if you could share this with friends and family to help further our reach of our dream and our community’s dream. Together, we all can succeed.
 
Testimonials
Ever since I started to train at SCEC I feel a lot stronger for the full 90 minutes of the game and my acceleration is much better. I recommend SCEC to all football (soccer) players who want to reach their full potential. 

Yannick Sambea Kakoko – football (soccer)– midfielder for Arka Gdynia
Throughout my career I never did strength training. SCEC made me realize and taught me all the positives that come with properly designed weight training and olympic lifting program. Because of that I increased my much needed power and endurance. 

Marcin Chabowski – track and field - long distance runner 
SCEC thought me that rehabilitation means nothing without properly implemented strength training. Great strength result and awesome progress in all physical components couldn't be possible without SCEC.

Mateusz Piechowski – handball – circle runner for Wisła Płock
Training at SCEC is a great way to achieve your performance goals. Confidence in the cage, more endurance, less injuries are only few of many benefits of working with these experienced coaches.
  
Kacper Bróździak – MMA figther 
I was able to see significant gains in my athleticism, from flexibility, to strength, and speed. I was able to not only get stronger but also increase my muscle endurance and overall stamina.

Kevin Russell – American football – quarterback for Pakenham Silverbacks (formerly University of Redlands) 
I am extremely thankful because I learned how to train properly, what exercises are best, what to do and most importantly what not to do and finally how to eat properly. Exercise selection is unique and knowledge is above and beyond other strength & conditioning coaches.

Jakub Dłoniak - basketball - shooting guard for TBV Start Lublin
I am extremely grateful for the training that enabled me to get ready for the Major League Soccer SuperDraft combine in 2014. I was able to come in 2nd place in vertical jump, 5th place in 30 meter sprint and 10th place in 5-10-5 agility test out of the players tested during the combine.

Richie Marquez – football (soccer) – center back for the Philadelphia Union
 
THANK YOU ALL FOR YOUR SUPPORT

story:
YouTube Tutorials

 

 

 

FAQ

The full list of FAQs can be found on our website here.

How big is it?

196 mm x 104 mm x 29.5 mm--slightly bigger than a TI-83 graphing calculator.

How many meds can it store?

A single EllieGrid pillbox can store seven different types of medication. The mobile app can track an unlimited amount. The compartments can hold about one month's worth of small pills or one week's worth of large pills, depending on the frequency of intake.

Battery solution?

The lithium-ion polymer battery lasts approximately one week with typical usage. Includes a USB power cable for quick recharging.

How do I set it up?

The user-friendly mobile app for iOS and Android allows you to easily set-up, monitor, and interact with your EllieGrid with a smartphone or tablet.

Do I have to have a smartphone to use one?

EllieGrid's main functionalities work without having to be connected to a phone. You only need a smartphone in order to program the EllieGrid device and if you want to keep caregivers updated on your progress. These tasks are done via a Bluetooth connection. If EllieGrid is not connected to a smartphone, it will still be able to sound the alarm and use the LED light to tell you which pills to take and how many. 

That being said, once you program the device the information is stored in the device, so no smartphone is required for the device to sound the alarm in order to  EllieGrid can connect directly through a smartphone's Bluetooth. After initial setup, no smartphone is required as long as your regimen doesn't change. The only time you need a smartphone is when you are programming the device.

What material is it made of and is that okay for my meds?

The inside of EllieGrid is made with Delrin, a food-safe and FDA-approved plastic. The outside of EllieGrid is a soft touch material that looks and feels great!

story:
TECH HELPING BEES

A Health Monitor For Honey Bees



1/3 OF OUR FOOD DEPENDS ON BEES More than honey! Without bees we don’t have watermelons, cashews, cucumbers, apples, mangoes, avocados, almonds, apricots, cherries, pears, peaches, nectarines, raspberries, blackberries and blueberries to name a few. Not to mention beef or dairy. Guess what pollinates the alfalfa and clover grass the cows eat?


42% OF BEE COLONIES DIED IN 2014 Since 2006 beekeepers have reported colony losses exceeding 30%, which is unsustainable. To make up for losses, beekeepers divide colonies (called splitting), to force the bees to make 2 weak colonies from 1 strong one. But more weak colonies leads to higher loss rates, so there’s no stable bee population in sight.


EYESONHIVES HELPS BEEKEEPERS We’re so passionate about this issue we built a technology from scratch to better understand what was happening at bee hives, alert beekeepers to changes, and help them understand their bees with software that measures hive activity, and gives video playback and alerts through a web app.


CONNECTS BEEKEEPERS TO THEIR BEES

VIDEO AND DATA FROM THE BEEHIVE

EyesOnHives uses a camera and computer to visually monitor what goes on at the bee hive all day, every day. Activity is measured by tracking the number of flying bees.

ADVANCED TECH THAT'S EASY TO USE

Colony activity patterns are tracked over time using computerized video analysis. Hours of video is automatically translated into an easy to understand, visual, real-time summary for beekeepers.


MEASURES THE HIVE AS A WHOLE

A key insight is that it’s not just the ‘count’ of individual bees that matters, it’s their flight behavior. EyesOnHives doesn’t just look at bees, it measures flight behavior of the hive as a superorganism!



CREATED BY AND FOR BEEKEEPERS

When Paul, a beekeeper of 40+ years asked us to count bees coming out of a hive because he couldn't check on it frequently enough himself - now that bees are so vulnerable to colony collapse - we were inspired to help.


CROWD SOURCED DATA TO HELP BEEKEEPERS

Every beehive contributes data to the EyesOnHives analytics platform and improves the system for all beekeepers. You can support the effort directly as a beekeeper, or backer.




YOUR BEES ON YOUR iPHONE, REALLY!

The EyesOnHives Analytics web app, is PC / Mac / iOS / Android / Linux compatible



FINALLY, DATA SCIENCE TO HELP THE BEES


One of the most exciting things we found was what we call the "orientation spike" in data.

In a healthy hive we see an activity spike mid-afternoon as new field bees take their first 'orientation' flights.


Sick hives, or hives that are under attack, show different activity signatures.


Graphing the average daily bee activity over time shows how a hive is growing.


It turns out the flight activity is an indication of hive health as it grows and gives an early warning if something is wrong.


It feels pretty great to save an entire colony of creatures. No more finding they've all died because they didn't get help.



VIDEO MAKES DATA EASY TO UNDERSTAND


KEEPING AN EYE ON BEE HIVES

Video, timelapse and beehive activity data is available through the web app, which is PC / Mac / iOS / Android / Linux compatible. Beekeepers can see videos of interest, if anything unusual occurred at their hives, and quickly notice trends.



SHARING BEES AND KNOWLEDGE

EyesOnHives makes it easy to share with others to promote awareness and knowledge of bee health and activity patterns. Turns out some pretty surprising things happen in front of a beehive too.



WATCH WHAT THE BEES ARE DOING

Skilled beekeepers look at hive activity and know the bees need assistance. But too often problems are not seen until it is too late and the colony is lost. We asked 'what if all beekeepers could continuously monitor their hive?" Now they can!



VIDEO AT THE HIVE ENTRANCE

Storch's At The Hive Entrance catalogs "How to know what happens inside the hive by observation on the outside". We were inspired. EyesOnHives allows beekeepers to use this same visual intuition remotely.




FIELD TESTED FOR OVER A YEAR

We started tracking hives over a year ago and have already run a successful pilot program with local beekeepers, learning more and building the beginnings of a community along the way.



JOIN US

BEES MAKE LIFE MORE AWESOME

We’re beekeepers ourselves and believe that sustainable solutions embrace the principles of permaculture rather than pesticides. EyesOnHives gives beekeepers better data to make smart decisions, and help keep our pollinators around.


WE AND THE BEES NEED YOU

With your help we can start collecting data from many regions across the US and eventually the world. The ability to use video analytics to issue alerts and predict hive outcomes is in its infancy. More data is needed to help correlate specific hive diseases, pests, and bee behavior to the hive activity measurements.


JOIN IF YOU'RE A BEEKEEPER

If you are a beekeeper, EyesOnHives gives you greater access and connection to your bees, while saving you time. Become a member of our community of citizen scientists and watch videos of bees, see trending data from other hives, make comments, and help identify anomalies to improve the EyesOnHives alerts.


NOT YET A BEEKEEPER? YOU CAN HELP

Join the community by becoming a Social Bee supporter. Alternatively, sponsor a beekeeper by purchasing a system that we place through a recognized beekeeping association.




AS SEEN IN


RESERVE A SYSTEM



REQUIREMENTS

EyesOnHives is focused on backyard and rooftop beekeepers. The system does not disturb your colony, require modifications to your hive, or take hours to set up. Simply place the unit one to two feet away from the hive and point at the hive entrance. The system uses Wi-Fi to communicate alerts, upload video, and report trending data. Setup requires access to 120V power and a usable Wi-Fi signal at the hive. 

Power and WiFi are needed!

All units except Model Bee include 1 year access to the web application and analytics platform, which is accessible on any internet enabled computer or smartphone (iOS/Android), and is where you can see and graph all historical activity data. Approximately 14 days of archived videos are available for on demand viewing. After the first year we hope you'll want to stay on the platform, which is planned to retail for $10/month as your Netflix for bees. Thank you for your support!

Our goal is to grow a network of connected hives. The data generated benefits every beekeeper, since everyone can benefit from shared learning.

Please support our project, and share your comments and feedback!

story:
Check out our website at https://tekrapod.com/ for more information! 

 

 

 

 

You can also listen to us on “The Fit File” podcast hosted by DC Rainmaker and GPlama by clicking here : https://podcasts.apple.com/ie/podcast/the-fit-file-with-dc-rainmaker-and-gplama/id988577732?i=1000443808842

(We’re 43 minutes in).

Tekrapod is an open-water safety device designed by open-water swimmers. Its patent-pending technology includes a seamless, flexible back-pack with light-weight internal bladder and powerful strobe light. The Bladder can be activated by pulling the red toggle.

 

 

  • Elasticated straps with silicone grippers, give a snug fit that doesn’t chafe even in skins.
  • Latest laminated neoprene, ensures a comfortable, neutrally buoyant, race legal device.
  • Simple to activate with a large red pull toggle.
  • Back mounted strobe light, for added visibility in the water.
  • Simple Velcro fastener to ensure the internal bladder remains hidden until you need it.

 

  • Adjustable straps ensures the Tekrapod fits all sizes from XXS to XXL
  • Streamlined front clasp is hydrodynamic and ideal for surfers when they lay chest down on boards.

High-powered strobe light.

A closer look at the top-up tube, whistle, red activation toggle and buddy loop.

Our team of open-water swimmers, triathletes and occasional surfers couldn’t find a comprehensive safety device that fulfilled the needs of open-water enthusiasts. We found this to be particularly true for open-water swimmers. Current on-the-market devices altered or interfered with your stroke, became tangled in the lights of winds and were far from from hydrodynamic. So, we designed our own!

The optimal location of the Tekrapod between your shoulder blades ensures your stroke is unaffected. A badly located device will lower your legs, causing unwanted drag.

We love DC Rainmakers opinion on wearing the Tekrapod when he says:

Check out the full review via the link below:

https://www.dcrainmaker.com/2019/07/tekrapod-openwater-safety.html

Watch the video below to see how it works:
 

 

 
Drowning is the third leading cause of unintentional injury death. According to the World Health Organisation there have been 360,000 annual drowning deaths worldwide. Children, men and individuals with increased access to water are most at risk. This puts open-water swimmers, SUPers etc. in the firing line when it comes to water safety.
Open bodies of water demand respect and care should always be taken, to ensure you can swim safely and also have an enjoyable experience. Always have a plan before entering an open body of water, here at Tekrapod we want to be part of your plan.
 
 
More and more events are implementing rules requiring participants to wear personal safety devices. In many ways this greater awareness towards safety is warranted. 
 
However, devices like tow buoys are not race legal. The Tekrapod is! Unlike the tow buoy it remains deflated in the stream-lined backpack until you need it.
 
We have already had great success with the Tekrapod in local races. So far our pre-launch testers have won: 1st female in the 1KM Metalman Series event. This event is one of the biggest open-water swimming events in the West of Ireland. Whilst another wearer also won first place in the female Masters in the Channel cup swim! Tekrapod doesn’t slow you down!
 
 
 

 

The Tekrapod is also excellently suited to stand-up paddle boarding! The backpacks positioning doesn’t interfere with your paddling and the thin elastic straps don’t cause chafe. Useful for when you decide to paddle long-distances but don’t want any nasty friction burns on your shoulders or neck afterwards!
 
Simple, seamless, safety.
With thanks to:
 

 

Risks & Challenges

We are fully aware of the risks and challenges involved in bringing a completely new open-water safety device to market. As our product is quite complex and made of 3 distinct parts this adds to the challenge. However, we now have our manufacturers lined up and ready to go. In the unlikely event we hit a ‘roadblock’, we will keep our backers fully informed with email updates every step of the way.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t buy a Tekrapod, no worries you can still play a vital role in getting word out about the Tekrapod.

  • Follow us on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter.
  • Share our pages with friends and family.
  • Let your local triathlon/swim/Multisport club know about the Tekrapod!
  • Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates and offers.
  • Share our posts and enter our social media competitions.
  • And don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks for all the support!

Team Tekrapod.
