You can also listen to us on “The Fit File” podcast hosted by DC Rainmaker and GPlama by clicking here : https://podcasts.apple.com/ie/podcast/the-fit-file-with-dc-rainmaker-and-gplama/id988577732?i=1000443808842
(We’re 43 minutes in).



Tekrapod is an open-water safety device designed by open-water swimmers. Its patent-pending technology includes a seamless, flexible back-pack with light-weight internal bladder and powerful strobe light. The Bladder can be activated by pulling the red toggle.

 
 


Elasticated straps with silicone grippers, give a snug fit that doesn’t chafe even in skins.
Latest laminated neoprene, ensures a comfortable, neutrally buoyant, race legal device.
Simple to activate with a large red pull toggle.
Back mounted strobe light, for added visibility in the water.
Simple Velcro fastener to ensure the internal bladder remains hidden until you need it.

 

Adjustable straps ensures the Tekrapod fits all sizes from XXS to XXL
Streamlined front clasp is hydrodynamic and ideal for surfers when they lay chest down on boards.


High-powered strobe light.

A closer look at the top-up tube, whistle, red activation toggle and buddy loop.



Our team of open-water swimmers, triathletes and occasional surfers couldn’t find a comprehensive safety device that fulfilled the needs of open-water enthusiasts. We found this to be particularly true for open-water swimmers. Current on-the-market devices altered or interfered with your stroke, became tangled in the lights of winds and were far from from hydrodynamic. So, we designed our own!

The optimal location of the Tekrapod between your shoulder blades ensures your stroke is unaffected. A badly located device will lower your legs, causing unwanted drag.


We love DC Rainmakers opinion on wearing the Tekrapod when he says:


Check out the full review via the link below:
https://www.dcrainmaker.com/2019/07/tekrapod-openwater-safety.html



Watch the video below to see how it works:
 


 

 



Drowning is the third leading cause of unintentional injury death. According to the World Health Organisation there have been 360,000 annual drowning deaths worldwide. Children, men and individuals with increased access to water are most at risk. This puts open-water swimmers, SUPers etc. in the firing line when it comes to water safety.

Open bodies of water demand respect and care should always be taken, to ensure you can swim safely and also have an enjoyable experience. Always have a plan before entering an open body of water, here at Tekrapod we want to be part of your plan.
 



 
More and more events are implementing rules requiring participants to wear personal safety devices. In many ways this greater awareness towards safety is warranted. 
 
However, devices like tow buoys are not race legal. The Tekrapod is! Unlike the tow buoy it remains deflated in the stream-lined backpack until you need it.
 
We have already had great success with the Tekrapod in local races. So far our pre-launch testers have won: 1st female in the 1KM Metalman Series event. This event is one of the biggest open-water swimming events in the West of Ireland. Whilst another wearer also won first place in the female Masters in the Channel cup swim! Tekrapod doesn’t slow you down!

 


 

 


 

The Tekrapod is also excellently suited to stand-up paddle boarding! The backpacks positioning doesn’t interfere with your paddling and the thin elastic straps don’t cause chafe. Useful for when you decide to paddle long-distances but don’t want any nasty friction burns on your shoulders or neck afterwards!


 
Simple, seamless, safety.
With thanks to:

 

 

Risks & Challenges
We are fully aware of the risks and challenges involved in bringing a completely new open-water safety device to market. As our product is quite complex and made of 3 distinct parts this adds to the challenge. However, we now have our manufacturers lined up and ready to go. In the unlikely event we hit a ‘roadblock’, we will keep our backers fully informed with email updates every step of the way.

Other Ways You Can Help
If you can’t buy a Tekrapod, no worries you can still play a vital role in getting word out about the Tekrapod.

Follow us on Instagram, Facebook and Twitter.
Share our pages with friends and family.
Let your local triathlon/swim/Multisport club know about the Tekrapod!
Subscribe to our newsletter to receive updates and offers.
Share our posts and enter our social media competitions.
And don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks for all the support!Team Tekrapod.

story:
The Most Reliable & Detailed Heart Rate Tracker

BEAT 20 is a high precison ECG heart rate tracker, free of wires and patches, capable of generating a ECG Graph, displays the dynamic heart rate, resting heart rate, 24-hour continuous heart rate, while maintaining maximum comfort as well as super high precision, over threshold warning to reach a physical peak and prevents over training. Offers a practical measure for assessing exercise intensity and health management. 

The Role of Heart Rate Training 

Heart rate training can be an effective way to measure how hard your body is working while running.Heart rate can be considered as a reliable indicator of the physiological load both for real-time training monitoring and for post-training analysis. 

Those who continuously exceeded their target and maximum heart rates while playing had poor rates of recovery after exercise. They also increased their risk for cardiac events such as:arrhythmias,chest paint,discomfort

The Ultra-Precision Sensor leads to more reliable data

Why is BEAT 20 so accurate

An ostensive performance study shows the high precision of BEAT 20

ECG Reading and Recording

BEAT 20 is capable of generating a Heart Rhytm Graph of 30-second periods

Statement：Beat 20  is used in non-diagnostic applications

 

Get the Most from Your Workouts

Exercising at the correct intensity can help you get the most out of your physical training, making sure you're not pushing too hard or too little. Calculate your desired target heart rate zone — the level at which your heart is being exercised and conditioned but not overworked.

Instead of pace per mile, heart rate training relies on bpm as a guide for how fast you should run. Heart rate training uses zones based on your maximum heart rate. 

 

BEAT 20 offers an accurate real-time heart rate measurement, real-time acquisition of the current heart rate state when you are training,displays your current heart rate zone and the real time ratio of your zones and checks your overall data and analysis after exercise.All of those help you understand the effect of your training and help you to fine-tune your intensity in future workouts.

Trying to keep your heart rate up in a comfortable zone can be challenging. Work with a running coach or fitness professional to design workouts at an appropriate level for you. Always see your doctor before starting a new running or fitness routine.

Your Resting Heart Rate reflects your current and future health. In certain cases, a lower resting heart rate can mean a higher degree of physical fitness. However, a high resting heart rate could be a sign of an increased risk of cardiac problems under vertain circumstances. The Shanren Sport app can be used to check your resting electrocardiogram for reference to your heart health.

Follow your heart rate around the clock, automatically and intelligentently. It's a continuous heart rate solution and let you have the full benefits of heart rate monitoring. BEAT20 tracks your heart rate all day and night.

All in The Numbers

Monitoring your Dynamic Heart Rate to get the best in your workout activity is the best way to both lower your resting heart rate and increase your maximum heart rate and aerobic capacity. Even small amounts of exercise can make a difference. Check your resting heart rate early and often, paying closer attention to your heart health than previously possible.

Recyclable High-Capacity Memory Storage

BEAT 20 contains built-in, reusable storage memory with the capacity for 260 hours / 100 training sessions. The data starts being recorded as soon as you put the monitor on. What's more, you can upload all this data to the Shanren Sports app, allowing you to have it available to examine, analyse and compare with your past and future heart rate data.

 

Early Overexertion Vibration Alert

Use BEAT 20 to keep track of your training. If you find yourself continuously working in zone 4 or higher, you might want to slow down. You can work with a professional trainer or running coach to help you determine a workout schedule based on your goals.

In order to prevent over-exercising, BEAT 20 provides a gentle tap on your front chest when your heart rate reaches it's desirable maximum. This is your cue to immediately adjust your training intensity.

You might want to back off to a more comfortable pace if you’re consistently reaching your maximum heart rate while running. Stop exercising if you feel lightheaded, dizzy, or ill.

 

Good Compatibility with Other Devices

SHANREN BEAT20 has ANT+ and BLE4.0 Dual Modes Communication that allow you to have the data it captures to be shared with your watch, phone, bike computer or other Bluetooth and ANT+ enabled devices.

 

280-Hour Working Time

BEAT 20 can be used for about 280 hours on a single full-capacity charge.

Heart rate monitoring for swimmers

 

The idea of Chest Strap

SHANREN BEAT 20 can be attached around the torso as a compact and comfortable chest strap, with soft, highly sensitive, conductive pads and non-iriitating fabric.

Your Health & Fitness Tracker

With a magnetic charge interface that allows you to keep this device quickly, fully and efficiently charged, BEAT 20 is a resistant device that is robustly waterproof (up to a 30-meter depth). So, if you’re a swimmer, this tracker is the right device for you.

                     Health Management                                                             Daily Fitness

                     Pro-Athlete Training                                                      Gym Work Out Plan

Bringing the highest value out of your training

Lighting a fire in our design Lab

Reliable & reasonable structural design

 

 

Meet Shanren

Our story began in 2012. Shanren was created by three young people, coming from the different fields of electronic chips, product development and the Internet. We engrained in our name, SHANREN, the meaning of people living in harmony with nature. As a technology company we are passionate about innovating high-level fitness and health tracking devices for cycling enthusiasts.

Over 7 years, a group of geeks, designers, engineers and fitness enthusiasts has reengineered our company time and time again to grow and thrive, with ideas that open new markets and avenues of innovation in rehabilitation training. Our breakthroughs in heart rate analysis and motion algorithms help people improve their bodies through effective exercise. The outcome speaks for itself: we have achieved proven results and have registered several patens in related areas.

Out kickstart was 1.5-million-dollar Pre-A round investment in 2016.

We will met you where you were and got you where you needed to go, and along the way, our core values of innovation and commitment have remained the same.

Shanren launched Di-Pro the GPS bike computer on Indiegogo in Feb 2019, and we are elated to say that we have shipped to all our trusting backers. It's our pride to not have disappointed you!

 

AS FEASURED ON 

Spring Training with the Beat 20 ECG Heart Rate Monitor

REVIEWED BY - DR. MARIE J. MICZAK, DSC, PHD

This season I have the chance to try this new ECG Heart Rate Monitor to train with. Unlike other heart rate monitors (that I've attempted to use), this one is easy to set up and get working right out of the box. Comes fully charged with recharging ability via USB cable. It actually shows your real-time ECG wave as if you're in the doctor's office!  Pretty advanced.  Connects to your phone via Bluetooth and the sport app, it will store your training sessions which can be saved and uploaded elsewhere.

The Beat 20 sensor is waterproof, making it suitable for everything from sweaty weight lifting to swimming pool laps.  Also gives you: distance, speed, steps taken, cadence, data storage and analysis with a vibration warning when you are reaching your heart-rate threshold. Your personalized profile within the app shows YOUR maximum heart rate based on age and other individual factors. It can also be paired with your bicycle computer so you can have all that data in one place during your ride. This is a bit more complicated and you'll need to be sure that your bicycle electronics has either Bluetooth or ANT+ connection capabilities.  Perfect also for walking, running or weight lifting sessions at the gym. The chest strap itself is very comfortable and easily adjustable. Quite impressed so far with the Beat 20 and can't wait to start seriously training with it this spring.

 

Campaign Timeline

 

Specifications

  • Product Name: SHANREN BEAT 20
  • Model: SR-HRM20 
  • Communication: ANT+/BLE 4.0 
  • Battery: Built-in rechargeable Li-battery 
  • Work Time:  280hrs 
  • Strap Length:  65-95cm (25.6-37.4in)
  • Sensor Size: 62x35x11mm
  • Waterproof: IP68
  • App Supports: Shanren Sport, Runtastic, Strava, Polar and more
  • Compatible with: bike computers, heart rate watches, ANT+ and BLE devices
  • IOS & Android Devices: IOS 7.0 or later, Android 6.0 or late

Time Line

Worldwide Free Shipping 

We ship worldwide free shipping. Prices exclude any local duties or sales tax. We plan to ship the product to backers in end of July 2019. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.

story:
The Oclean Air is the light and compact version of the design award-winning - Oclean One - The World's Most Powerful Electric Toothbrush. 

The Oclean Air runs with the same patented customizable brushing plans application as the Oclean One and SE models.

The Oclean Air embeds cutting-edge Kotl sonic motor technology providing ultra-fast movement speed to eradicate dental plaque. 

From left to right: Oclean One / Oclean SE / Oclean Air

 

Oclean Air - Teaser
 

Oral care needs are very different from one to another. This is why we designed an easy to use companion app which will transform the way you brush your teeth.

Oclean application recommends brushing plans based on your age, gender, eating habits, etc.

You can tailor your perfect brushing plan by choosing the duration and intensity of several steps. Also get feedback on how to improve your brushing gesture.

Already availaible on
Android Play Store and Apple Appstore

Quick step by step tutorial on how to connect the Oclean Air to the Oclean app

 

  • Tired of recharging your toothbrush every week?
  • Worried about its short battery life while traveling?
  • The charger is too heavy and chunky to carry around?

Although light and compact, the Oclean Air features a high-capacity battery that will need only to be plugged one hour per month to be fully charged for 30 days.

Its lightweith USB magnetic charging cradle is easy to carry anywhere and is compatible across all our models One / SE / Air.

The Oclean Air is 30% smaller and lighter than the Oclean One; that makes it the ideal companion to travel.

You can check our previous campaign and yes we shipped on time and on quality so you can be assured that the same goes for the Oclean Air :) See what our users think about the Oclean One here.

We use BPA-free and FDA approved materials. Certifications are available here

In exclsuivity on Indiegogo, we offer a pack of 6 heads (3 packs of 2 heads) at $25 so you are covered for more than a year at an incredible price.

The Oclean Air incorporates blue and pink bristles from Pedex by default which are compatible across all Oclean models One / SE / Air:

Our Standard and Deep Clean Brush Head models use a combination of Pedex and DuPont bristles to provide long-lasting maximum cleaning performance.

To help you make the most use of your brush head, our smart application tracks your brush head usage and reminds you to change it at the precise time.

Choose your own type of brush head according to your own oral care needs and requirements:

Standard Clean Brush Head:

Our patented diamond-shape design for the filament base greatly increases bristle density, thus bringing our cleaning power to a whole new level.

The Oclean Air is IPX7 water-resistant certified and uses best-in-class materials alike the design award-winning Oclean One.

We have even thought about helping you saving space in your bathroom with the dedicated Oclean Air Mount that you can set on any flat surface in your bathroom such as a mirror. 

Here are some unboxing and reviews from our previous models in various languages:

  • Xiaomi Huami Amazfit Oclean One - Sonic Electric Toothbrush
  • OCLEAN ONE Sonic Toothbrush Review
  • Oclean one pairing (very simple) - World's Most Powerful Sonic Toothbrush
  • Oclean One Sonic Toothbrush Unboxing & Demonstration
  • Oclean SE Sonic Electrical Toothbrush Review ​
  • Cepillo de dientes eléctrico OCLEAN SE
  • Original Xiaomi Oclean SE Cepillo de dientes eléctrico sónico 
  • Recensione Oclean SE (Xiaomi) : Lo spazzolino SMART con motore sonico, bluetooth e app! 
  • OCLEAN ONE ЗУБНАЯ ЩЕТКА С ДИНАМИКОМ
  • Обзор зубной щетки Oclean SE
  • Oclean One Smart Sonic electric toothbrush элегантная и функциональная зубная щетка 
  • Szczoteczka Soniczna Xiaomi Oclean One od Xiaomi 
  • Unboxing Oclean SE - najnowszej szczoteczki sonicznej od Xiaomi
  • OCLEAN ONE : LA BROSSE À DENTS ÉLECTRIQUE 2.0

  • Jounal du Geek - Test: Prise en main de la brosse à dents sonique Oclean One

We gathered an all-star team to create the smartest toothbrush.

 

 

  • How often do I have to charge the Oclean Air?

Oclean Air has a battery life of up to 30 days, when the toothbrush power gets down to 10%, the power button will flash red to remind you to charge the toothbrush. 

 

  • How long can a head brush be used for?

When the brush head is used for a long time, the surface of the brush will be bifurcated and the hardness is reduced due to fatigue. The cleaning power will be greatly reduced. Dentists recommend replacing the head brush every 3 months to obtain better cleaning effect.

 

  • Where can I buy replacement head brushes post-campaign? 

The app gives you a reminder about the status of your head brush and on average you will have to change your head brush every 3 months if you use it twice a day. Each perk comes with one head brush. The Early Bird Pack comes with a total of 5 head brushes (2 x 2 head pack + 1 set on the Oclean Air) so it covers more than a year of use.

You can already buy head brushes online through GearBest and our Amazon resellers. On top of that, we will have several distribution agents selling Oclean exclusive head brushes in various countries. 

 

  • Where do you ship to? 

We ship worldwide and the shipment is Free for our Indiegogo Backers, please note you may have to pay some local customs taxes at reception (especially in the EU). If you missed the campaign, you will be able to get it later from our official local and online resellers.

 

  • Is there VAT charges involved?

Backers are solely responsible for all duties, import taxes and brokerage fees. These are not included in the cost of shipping or handling of your order.
Customs, duties, and taxes vary widely from country to country; please check with your local customs agency for details on estimated costs. Customs, duty, and taxes are non-refundable: so if you refuse a shipment because of unexpected import fees, the cost of the original shipping, any brokerage/customs/duty/taxes, and any return shipping charges will not be refunded.

 

  • What is your refund policy?

We have a 5 day no question asked policy: you can ask for a replacement or refund in case of defective hardware within 5 days of receipt, send an e-mail to partner@oclean.com with your name and backer details as well as proof of reception (logistic service provider receipt). 
Backers shall bear the costs for the shipment back and must provide a tracking number to partner@oclean.com once the parcel is shipped. The shipping fees will not be refunded in any case.
After receiving the defective item, Oclean will either repair, replace or refund the defective product. If a unit is sent for repair or replacement, Oclean will bear the costs of the shipping back to the buyer.
If any items (a) are returned after the specified return period; (b) have been physically damaged, modified, or damaged; or not covered by warranty (c) are missing any parts, you will not receive any refund, replacement or repair. Backers are also solely responsible to any duties, import taxes and brokerage fees imputable to repaired merchandise (the taxation, if any, will be on replacement parts and labour and transportation).

 

  • How will I know when my order ships & can I track my package online?

As soon as our warehouse ships your order, we will send you an email notifying you that your package is en route. In this email we will include a tracking number from the logistic service provider.

 

  • How long will it take for my package to arrive?

We will be on time. No worries. You can check our previous campaign here. The time it takes to receive your parcel depends on the country you live in, it usually takes between 10 and 30 days from the tracking number information provided via email by our Support Team from our service center in Shenzhen - China. As part of our beta testers, Backers are the very first people in the World to receive our products; the preorders are divided between Super Early Birds (Day 1 of introduction) and Early Birds (until the end of the campaign). Any returns of the beta testers, must be sent back to our service center in Shenzhen - China.

 

  • What is a sonic electric toothbrush?

Sonic electric toothbrushes, also known as sound wave electric toothbrushes, use magnetic levitation motors as a power source. Driven by the toothbrush head in accordance with high frequency vibration to achieve a better brushing experience than mechanical and automatic toothbrushes.

 

  • What are the advantages of a sonic toothbrush compared to manual and automatic toothbrushes?

Sonic toothbrushes have the following advantages:

1. Sonic toothbrushes clean more thoroughly and will whiten your teeth in the long-term.

Many people do not brush their teeth thoroughly that results in lot of bacteria and food compiling on the tooth surface. Over time that will create plaque and form calculus which can be hard to remove. Sonic toothbrushes have high-speed vibration that completely clean the tooth surface so they effectively remove plaque, preventing the production of calculus and ensuring your teeth are healthier. In addition, regular use of sonic toothbrushes can gradually whiten the teeth whereas manual and automatic toothbrushes are not very effective on in-depth clearing and whitening.

2. Sonic toothbrushes are safer and have less wear on teeth than manual and automatic toothbrushes.

Sonic toothbrushes is designed to break the toothpaste into tiny bubbles with the help of high speed vibration. It drives the water to remove the residues stuck between teeth. Many number of studies have shown that sonic toothbrushes are safer than manual toothbrushes because they do not harm the soft tissues and gums inside the mouth.

3. Reduce bleeding gums and prevents variety of oral diseases

Exports reports that bleeding gums is not caused by brushing too hard but mostly due to not brushing properly. Harmful bacteria near the gums generates germs which simulates gums bleeding. Sonic toothbrushes compared to manual and automatic toothbrushes can remove more than 38% of the bacteria on the teeth and reduce the bleeding rate of the gums by 60%.

 

  • What advantages does the sonic electric toothbrush have compared to a rotary electric toothbrush?

Sonic electric toothbrushes clean the surface of the teeth and at the same time drives the flow of water to wash away any food residue stuck on the blind area within the mouth while rotary electric toothbrushes are not suited for the people with sensitive teeth, their motor mainly rely on the brush and tooth surface friction clean and make unnecessary noise.

 

  • I have braces, can I use a sonic electric toothbrush?

Sonic toothbrushes do not affect your braces, professional dentists recommends using an electric sonic toothbrush on braces as it easily removes food residues stuck on the braces.

 

  • Can the Oclean Air be used by children?

Oclean Air is an adult electric toothbrush. Oclean will introduce a toothbrush specially designed for children later on.

 

  • Can I use the Chinese App of Oclean One Chinese Edition with the International Edition ?

No because the hardware is different on the International Version and the language is also different so you cannot use the Chinese version with the International Applications. The Oclean Air International Edition is exclusively available on Indiegogo from August 21st to 29th. You will be able to buy it through our certified resellers afterwards.
story_txt:
The Oclean Air is the light and compact version of the design award-winning - Oclean One - The World's Most Powerful Electric Toothbrush. The Oclean Air runs with the same patented customizable brushing plans application as the Oclean One and SE models.

The Oclean Air embeds cutting-edge Kotl sonic motor technology providing ultra-fast movement speed to eradicate dental plaque. 

From left to right: Oclean One / Oclean SE / Oclean Air
 Oclean Air - Teaser Oral care needs are very different from one to another. This is why we designed an easy to use companion app which will transform the way you brush your teeth.Oclean application recommends brushing plans based on your age, gender, eating habits, etc.You can tailor your perfect brushing plan by choosing the duration and intensity of several steps. Also get feedback on how to improve your brushing gesture.Already availaible onAndroid Play Store and Apple AppstoreQuick step by step tutorial on how to connect the Oclean Air to the Oclean app 
Tired of recharging your toothbrush every week?
Worried about its short battery life while traveling?
The charger is too heavy and chunky to carry around?
Although light and compact, the Oclean Air features a high-capacity battery that will need only to be plugged one hour per month to be fully charged for 30 days.Its lightweith USB magnetic charging cradle is easy to carry anywhere and is compatible across all our models One / SE / Air.The Oclean Air is 30% smaller and lighter than the Oclean One; that makes it the ideal companion to travel.You can check our previous campaign and yes we shipped on time and on quality so you can be assured that the same goes for the Oclean Air :) See what our users think about the Oclean One here.We use BPA-free and FDA approved materials. Certifications are available hereIn exclsuivity on Indiegogo, we offer a pack of 6 heads (3 packs of 2 heads) at $25 so you are covered for more than a year at an incredible price.The Oclean Air incorporates blue and pink bristles from Pedex by default which are compatible across all Oclean models One / SE / Air:Our Standard and Deep Clean Brush Head models use a combination of Pedex and DuPont bristles to provide long-lasting maximum cleaning performance.To help you make the most use of your brush head, our smart application tracks your brush head usage and reminds you to change it at the precise time.Choose your own type of brush head according to your own oral care needs and requirements:Standard Clean Brush Head:Our patented diamond-shape design for the filament base greatly increases bristle density, thus bringing our cleaning power to a whole new level.The Oclean Air is IPX7 water-resistant certified and uses best-in-class materials alike the design award-winning Oclean One.We have even thought about helping you saving space in your bathroom with the dedicated Oclean Air Mount that you can set on any flat surface in your bathroom such as a mirror. Here are some unboxing and reviews from our previous models in various languages:
Xiaomi Huami Amazfit Oclean One - Sonic Electric Toothbrush 
OCLEAN ONE Sonic Toothbrush Review
Oclean one pairing (very simple) - World's Most Powerful Sonic Toothbrush 
Oclean One Sonic Toothbrush Unboxing & Demonstration

Oclean SE Sonic Electrical Toothbrush Review ​
Cepillo de dientes eléctrico OCLEAN SE 
Original Xiaomi Oclean SE Cepillo de dientes eléctrico sónico 
Recensione Oclean SE (Xiaomi) : Lo spazzolino SMART con motore sonico, bluetooth e app! 
OCLEAN ONE ЗУБНАЯ ЩЕТКА С ДИНАМИКОМ 
Обзор зубной щетки Oclean SE 
Oclean One Smart Sonic electric toothbrush элегантная и функциональная зубная щетка 

Szczoteczka Soniczna Xiaomi Oclean One od Xiaomi 
Unboxing Oclean SE - najnowszej szczoteczki sonicznej od Xiaomi 
OCLEAN ONE : LA BROSSE À DENTS ÉLECTRIQUE 2.0
Jounal du Geek - Test: Prise en main de la brosse à dents sonique Oclean One
We gathered an all-star team to create the smartest toothbrush. 

 
How often do I have to charge the Oclean Air?Oclean Air has a battery life of up to 30 days, when the toothbrush power gets down to 10%, the power button will flash red to remind you to charge the toothbrush.  How long can a head brush be used for?When the brush head is used for a long time, the surface of the brush will be bifurcated and the hardness is reduced due to fatigue. The cleaning power will be greatly reduced. Dentists recommend replacing the head brush every 3 months to obtain better cleaning effect. Where can I buy replacement head brushes post-campaign? The app gives you a reminder about the status of your head brush and on average you will have to change your head brush every 3 months if you use it twice a day. Each perk comes with one head brush. The Early Bird Pack comes with a total of 5 head brushes (2 x 2 head pack + 1 set on the Oclean Air) so it covers more than a year of use.You can already buy head brushes online through GearBest and our Amazon resellers. On top of that, we will have several distribution agents selling Oclean exclusive head brushes in various countries.  Where do you ship to? We ship worldwide and the shipment is Free for our Indiegogo Backers, please note you may have to pay some local customs taxes at reception (especially in the EU). If you missed the campaign, you will be able to get it later from our official local and online resellers. Is there VAT charges involved?Backers are solely responsible for all duties, import taxes and brokerage fees. These are not included in the cost of shipping or handling of your order.Customs, duties, and taxes vary widely from country to country; please check with your local customs agency for details on estimated costs. Customs, duty, and taxes are non-refundable: so if you refuse a shipment because of unexpected import fees, the cost of the original shipping, any brokerage/customs/duty/taxes, and any return shipping charges will not be refunded. What is your refund policy?We have a 5 day no question asked policy: you can ask for a replacement or refund in case of defective hardware within 5 days of receipt, send an e-mail to partner@oclean.com with your name and backer details as well as proof of reception (logistic service provider receipt). Backers shall bear the costs for the shipment back and must provide a tracking number to partner@oclean.com once the parcel is shipped. The shipping fees will not be refunded in any case.After receiving the defective item, Oclean will either repair, replace or refund the defective product. If a unit is sent for repair or replacement, Oclean will bear the costs of the shipping back to the buyer.If any items (a) are returned after the specified return period; (b) have been physically damaged, modified, or damaged; or not covered by warranty (c) are missing any parts, you will not receive any refund, replacement or repair. Backers are also solely responsible to any duties, import taxes and brokerage fees imputable to repaired merchandise (the taxation, if any, will be on replacement parts and labour and transportation). How will I know when my order ships & can I track my package online?As soon as our warehouse ships your order, we will send you an email notifying you that your package is en route. In this email we will include a tracking number from the logistic service provider. How long will it take for my package to arrive?We will be on time. No worries. You can check our previous campaign here. The time it takes to receive your parcel depends on the country you live in, it usually takes between 10 and 30 days from the tracking number information provided via email by our Support Team from our service center in Shenzhen - China. As part of our beta testers, Backers are the very first people in the World to receive our products; the preorders are divided between Super Early Birds (Day 1 of introduction) and Early Birds (until the end of the campaign). Any returns of the beta testers, must be sent back to our service center in Shenzhen - China. What is a sonic electric toothbrush?Sonic electric toothbrushes, also known as sound wave electric toothbrushes, use magnetic levitation motors as a power source. Driven by the toothbrush head in accordance with high frequency vibration to achieve a better brushing experience than mechanical and automatic toothbrushes. What are the advantages of a sonic toothbrush compared to manual and automatic toothbrushes?Sonic toothbrushes have the following advantages:1. Sonic toothbrushes clean more thoroughly and will whiten your teeth in the long-term.Many people do not brush their teeth thoroughly that results in lot of bacteria and food compiling on the tooth surface. Over time that will create plaque and form calculus which can be hard to remove. Sonic toothbrushes have high-speed vibration that completely clean the tooth surface so they effectively remove plaque, preventing the production of calculus and ensuring your teeth are healthier. In addition, regular use of sonic toothbrushes can gradually whiten the teeth whereas manual and automatic toothbrushes are not very effective on in-depth clearing and whitening.2. Sonic toothbrushes are safer and have less wear on teeth than manual and automatic toothbrushes.Sonic toothbrushes is designed to break the toothpaste into tiny bubbles with the help of high speed vibration. It drives the water to remove the residues stuck between teeth. Many number of studies have shown that sonic toothbrushes are safer than manual toothbrushes because they do not harm the soft tissues and gums inside the mouth.3. Reduce bleeding gums and prevents variety of oral diseasesExports reports that bleeding gums is not caused by brushing too hard but mostly due to not brushing properly. Harmful bacteria near the gums generates germs which simulates gums bleeding. Sonic toothbrushes compared to manual and automatic toothbrushes can remove more than 38% of the bacteria on the teeth and reduce the bleeding rate of the gums by 60%. What advantages does the sonic electric toothbrush have compared to a rotary electric toothbrush?Sonic electric toothbrushes clean the surface of the teeth and at the same time drives the flow of water to wash away any food residue stuck on the blind area within the mouth while rotary electric toothbrushes are not suited for the people with sensitive teeth, their motor mainly rely on the brush and tooth surface friction clean and make unnecessary noise. I have braces, can I use a sonic electric toothbrush?Sonic toothbrushes do not affect your braces, professional dentists recommends using an electric sonic toothbrush on braces as it easily removes food residues stuck on the braces. Can the Oclean Air be used by children?Oclean Air is an adult electric toothbrush. Oclean will introduce a toothbrush specially designed for children later on. Can I use the Chinese App of Oclean One Chinese Edition with the International Edition ?No because the hardware is different on the International Version and the language is also different so you cannot use the Chinese version with the International Applications. The Oclean Air International Edition is exclusively available on Indiegogo from August 21st to 29th. You will be able to buy it through our certified resellers afterwards.

story:
Michelle's Story

Think about the one person in your life that means everything to you. How much you love and adore them. Can't live without them.  Now imagine that they are fighting for their life.

Michelle has Stage 4 Breast Cancer. She's also a mother of two girls, Abby (14) and Savannah (9). She's married to the love of her life, Todd, for almost 18 years. She's a daughter and a loving sister.

Michelle's battle began January 21, 2005 when she was diagnosed with breast cancer at the young age of 34. After a double mastectomy, removing her lymph nodes, 16 weeks of aggressive chemotherapy and 6 weeks of radiation, it was finally gone. Her life went on. They bought a house that they shared with their many friends and family. She was happy and healthy.

Around October 2010, Michelle developed a cough.  Could it be exercise induced asthma? Whooping cough? No. It wasn't. In January 2011, they discovered tumors in her lungs. On a very sad day in April 2011, at the age of 40, she started chemotherapy again. She went to MD Anderson in Texas and to the National Institute of Health in Maryland for treatment. This is a very aggressive, fast moving cancer that is not responding to conventional treatment methods.

After 8 months of chemotherapy, it's not working.  Her tumors have grown significantly according to her latest PET Scan. She has a partially collapsed lung and tumors in her legs, knee and pelvic bone. Her only option at this point is alternative cancer treatment. Guess who doesn't pay for alternative cancer treatments? Insurance.  Not a dime. This is why we need your help. 

The Impact

Michelle is now legally disabled. Todd is working hard everyday to pay their mortgage and expenses. Plus, raising two children. This money will be used for Michelle's treatment, medications, travel and expenses.


What We Need & What You Get

$25,000 is a lot of money but not a lot for alternative treatment costs. If we have 1,250 of our friends and family donate $20.00 each, we can reach that goal. What do you get from this? You get the feeling of hope for Michelle. You get the warm feeling in your soul knowing that you helped someone that is in great need.


Other Ways You Can Help

Please send this to your Facebook friends, friends, colleagues, family to pass along and get the word out. If you can't donate, please take a moment to pray or send her your positive energy. Anything will help.

story:
iXtreme Hydrator

If you are like us you are active and try to squeeze the most out of life.  We got sick of all of the nasty stimulants in energy drinks (not to mention the way they taste) and don’t drink many sodas these days. Sports drinks are great for a workout, but not a good “everyday” drink you can enjoy when you’re at the office, while eating, or when you’re just plain thirsty. A little carbonation + refreshing flavor + hydrating electrolytes are just what we wanted, but couldn’t find a product that satisfied.

Thus iX, an iXtreme Hydrator was born. iX comes in two delicious flavors, (Berrie and Citrus) is bubbly, and is packed with electrolytes that aid in hydration. It’s the perfect combination of body pleasing electrolytes and taste bud pleasing flavor!

iX has more electrolytes than a sports drink and doesn’t have any stimulants that energy drinks do. That means no quick jittery artificial energy feeling, followed by a massive energy crash when the effects from the stimulants wear off.  

Electrolyte Your Life!

About the iX Crew

Who are we? Just a bunch of Denver, Colorado natives that like to enjoy life to its fullest. We’re five friends who grew up together, run together, ski together, play together, and generally get thirsty together. We needed a better drink to keep us going…one that actually tastes good!

Donation Options

It’s very important to us that if you donate you get to try iX yourself! As you can see from the donation levels to the right, most include some cans so you can see how delicious this hydration beverage truly is. We also have some cool shwag that you’ll be proud to rock as well.

Donation Use

We just picked up distribution in the mountain towns in Colorado! As a result we will be in grocery stores, convenience stores, restaurants, delis and everywhere else people go to buy drinks. Your donations will go to help us market iX, and grow our brand into new “iXtreme” markets nationwide.  These donations will help us create marketing shwag, cool ads, and generally help spread the iX word. You can be personally responsible for helping us to bring iXtreme Hydration everywhere!

How else can you help?

We appreciate any and all support! We know that not everyone can contribute, and that is ok, you can still help! If you want to see iX in stores everywhere please send this campaign to all of your friends and follow us on Facebook (www.facebook.com/drinkix) or at www.drinkix.com. Thank you!!

story:
Short Summary

Hello there :)

   My name is Myles. I am a 20 year old transgender man. I was born female, but I have felt like a boy my entire life. It might be hard for some of you to image. If it is a bit hard to understand, try to picture yourself, everything about your emotions, feelings, and physical appearance. Image that your physical was the opposite gender. It's hard for some to understand, others not so much. I have been taking Testosterone (injections) for 1 year and 3.5 months. Since beginning hormone replacement therapy I have 

  • Lost 10 lbs.
  • Gained more body hair
  • Grew noticeable facial hair
  • Grew 3 shoes sizes
  • My voice has deepened greatly (For you singers, I sing Baritone-High Bass range)
  • My body fat has redistributed to more masculine areas
  • Gain a bit more muscle in arms, chest, and legs
  • Acquired acne AGAIN! Haha fun!
    I have gained quite a lot of confidence that I did not have before because of these changes, but my body still does not match who I am inside. After 20 years of this it becomes a lot to handle at times. I love life so much and being involved with activities and around people, but sometimes my body prevents this. I am very energetic as well and it is very hard to be unable to fully participate in activities like swimming, wrestling (like I want to. The singlets would should my breasts and absence of complete male genitalia and I would have to ware a women's singlet because the guys one cuts too low). It makes it so I can not shower or change "normally" with my peers in the locker room and it gets very awkward when I am playing a game and the guys want to divide up teams by having half of us go shirtless. 

    It may not seem like much, but it hurts to be excluded because of something you can not control. It isn't even other people excluding me... it's my own body. It makes it a lot harder to date as well, which is not very fun because I have gotten my life together so to speak in many ways and I want to find someone to love and accept me like I do others that I meet in life. 

What I Need Help With & What You Get

    Right now I am trying to raise money to have "top surgery" or chest reconstructive surgery. It is scheduled for December, but I must have it paid in full by November. The total cost is $6,500 as well as accommodations because it is out of state and I have to have a pre-operative exam the day before and stay out there (Florida - where my doctor is, Dr. Garramone) for a week to get the drains and post-operative bandages off and be examined before flying home. I have some of the money, but I am very independent and with school and living expenses it is very hard to save enough. I had two jobs in the summer, but it still did not make much of a dent. 

   I am working very diligently to try to create a slogan and design for a T-shirt and car magnet as "Thank You"s for your donations. If you donate before they are ready I will make it up to you when they are done and come in! :) 

* I will have a limited number, but if this site allows I will send personalized "Thank You" emails to all who help

    I want the slogan to basically show support for not only transgender persons, but all people regardless of what makes us different. I am very different from many people I have grown up with in many ways so I am a big supporter of unity among all and acceptance of each others differences. I am multi-racial, I do not care about gender in regards to who I date, I am transgender, and my family is different than most in many ways as well, so I UNDERSTAND different, but I BELIEVE in together... coming together and accepting each other no matter what. 

The Impact

   I will forever be grateful to you all for not only your monitary contributions, but also for the emotional support and acceptance it represents!! If I exceed my goal, the rest of the money will be donated to my good friend of many years who is going through the same thing and is also trying to save for surgery himself. He too of course would be very, very grateful! 

Other Ways You Can Help

    You may be like me and not have much, if anything at all to donate... as far as money is concerned anyway, but you can still make a very BIG impact by

  • Posting a link to this page on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, or other social media
  • Tell your friends, family, co-workers, and anyone else you meet that is accepting in case they might be able to donate
  • Keep me in your thoughts and see if anything comes up :) 
*** For everyone's safety, if you know me personally please do not share any personal         information about me when you spread this around*** 

THANK YOU SO VERY, VERY MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT AND ACCEPTANCE! HAVE AN AMAZING DAY:)

story:
*** La collecte Indiegogo est terminée mais les dons sont toujours possibles par Paypal ou chèque. Contactez-nous pour plus d'infos. Merci ! ***


////

Nous sommes Alice et Ludovic et lançons cette collecte pour Magali, amie et voisine, pour l'aider à avoir accès aux soins dont elle a besoin et garder espoir de guérir.

En invalidité suite à de graves maladies, elle vit seule et ne perçoit qu'une faible pension. Elle vient d'apprendre qu'elle devait subir à la rentrée l'ablation de son rein gauche au CHU de Nantes. Après cette intervention, des soins spécifiques seront nécessaires pendant un mois au sein d'un établissement spécialisé.

Malgré de nombreuses démarches, il lui manque la somme de 500€ sans laquelle l'opération chirurgicale ne pourra pas avoir lieu...

Chaque don, même petit, compte pour se rapprocher de cette somme et lui donner accès aux soins.

Exemple : 100 personnes donnant 5€ = 500€ collectés

Il a fallu beaucoup de courage à Magali pour surmonter autant d'épreuves. Notre vœu le plus cher est qu'elle retrouve une bonne santé et une vie normale au plus vite.

Merci de diffuser le projet autour de vous en profitant du pouvoir de propagation offert par les réseaux sociaux.

 

Si vous souhaitez en discuter et/ou si vous ne souhaitez pas effectuer de paiement en ligne, vous pouvez nous joindre au 09 80 66 63 90 (téléphone fixe non surtaxé) du mardi au samedi dans la journée, ou par mail à help.magali@gmail.com.

 

 

////

 

We are Alice and Ludovic and we are collecting funds for Magali, a friend and neighbour, to help her get access to health care and hope she will soon recover.

Magali has a permanent disability, due several bad diseases. She lives on her own, and only receives a small disability pension. She has just been told she will have to go through a renal ablation in September in Nantes’ public Hospital. After this intervention, she will receive a special treatment for about a month in a specialized structure.

Even though she tried very hard, today she is still missing 500€, which are necessery for the surgical operation…

Each donation, even the smallest one, will help her raise that amount and give her access to health care.

Eg. 100 people giving 5€ = 500 € collected

It took a lot for Magali to overcome so many obstacles. Our greatest desire is that she improves health and get her life back to normal.

We count on you to forward the project especially on the social networks.
story_txt:
*** La collecte Indiegogo est terminée mais les dons sont toujours possibles par Paypal ou chèque. Contactez-nous pour plus d'infos. Merci ! ***

////
Nous sommes Alice et Ludovic et lançons cette collecte pour Magali, amie et voisine, pour l'aider à avoir accès aux soins dont elle a besoin et garder espoir de guérir.
En invalidité suite à de graves maladies, elle vit seule et ne perçoit qu'une faible pension. Elle vient d'apprendre qu'elle devait subir à la rentrée l'ablation de son rein gauche au CHU de Nantes. Après cette intervention, des soins spécifiques seront nécessaires pendant un mois au sein d'un établissement spécialisé.


Malgré de nombreuses démarches, il lui manque la somme de 500€ sans laquelle l'opération chirurgicale ne pourra pas avoir lieu...
Chaque don, même petit, compte pour se rapprocher de cette somme et lui donner accès aux soins.
Exemple : 100 personnes donnant 5€ = 500€ collectés
Il a fallu beaucoup de courage à Magali pour surmonter autant d'épreuves. Notre vœu le plus cher est qu'elle retrouve une bonne santé et une vie normale au plus vite.
Merci de diffuser le projet autour de vous en profitant du pouvoir de propagation offert par les réseaux sociaux.

story:
Cancer Survivor Needs Funding for Ongoing Treatment

I am scared and feel like I've been dealt a death sentence.

On November 22, 2010, I was diagnosed with breast cancer that also spread to my lymph nodes. I'm taking Tamoxifen, an oral chemo known to cause uterine cancer, for the next 2 years. My ongoing treatment requires quarterly visits with an oncologist, breast surgeon, gynecologist, and a dermatologist (I was also diagnosed with skin cancer). 

I was a beneficiary of my hospital's charity program until they chose to end it when the ACA was enacted. I'm forced to pay a $5,000 deductible before my payments are reduced to a $75 co-pay for each of my 6 specialists, who I must see quarterly. Until then, my doctor visits are $175 just to walk in, not including the tests that are always run.

If you choose to contribute, you will be potentially saving my life. Without quarterly blood work, I have no way of knowing if the cancer has come back. The odds of recurrence in my specific case are 35%. 

What Is Needed 

In order to reach the point where I only fork out my co-pays, I need $5,500 to pay for the deductible (and the fees for this campaign). Otherwise, I am without any healthcare at all. 

Although there are organizations that help cancer survivors undergoing chemo and radiation, there are none for survivors prescribed oral chemo. I have no where else to turn for help but here.

All contributions will be applied to my deductible in the form of covering doctor visits and medical tests. My next appointment is April 29 with my oncologist. Their office is unable to do anything to help, including reducing the appointment cost.

The Impact

Almost everyone, including myself, knows someone who has had breast cancer. Some of them have actually died because they were unable to afford their healthcare. Please help me avoid becoming one of them.

Other Ways You Can Help

Anyone who is unable to contribute can help by getting the word out and passing my story on to people who can. The Indiegogo share tools are available to make that easy.

One last thing: I never imagined I'd be in this position. I managed to finance my living expenses and health insurance during chemo and radiation, but it completely wiped out all of my savings. I currently work 3 jobs as an independent contractor, which don't provide company-paid insurance. But working for myself does avoid the stress of working in corporate America, which led to getting cancer.

Anything at all you can do will be gratefully appreciated.

story:
This research study will set out to determine how one’s activities of daily living affect not only lifespan but as importantly, healthspan.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

In the same research study on meditation, The Chopra Foundation, in collaboration with Harvard University and Mount Sinai Hospital, demonstrated that meditation leads to a significant enhancement of genes associated with wellbeing and a significant reduction in genes associated with stress and inflammation.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Based on the incredible findings from the previous study, and the potential impact on the medical and behavioral medicine literature, we are now embarking upon our next ground breaking research study called Self Directed Biological Transformation Study Initiative (SBTI) Research Study which is aimed at bringing optimal physical, mental, and spiritual wellbeing.   

SBTI will comprehensively examine the whole person through genetic, microbiome, biochemical, and physiological  assessments during a one-week immersion called the Perfect Health – Radical Wellbeing Program. 


The Perfect Health Program




Why are we doing it?

The mission statement of the Chopra Foundation is to help to create a more peaceful, just, sustainable, healthy and happier world.  Through the SBTI research study we want to demonstrate that a person’s wellbeing can be dramatically enhanced through effortless lifestyle practices.



Who is involved?

This study is in collaboration with scientists from the following institutions: Harvard University, the University of California San Francisco – Blackburn Group, Mount Sinai Hospital, Scripps Transitional Science Institute, and the University of California San Diego.

We will be seeking 60 participants to be randomized to the Perfect Health Radical Wellbeing program and 60 participants to be randomized to a control group.


How will it change the way to do medicine?

When it is demonstrated that so many aspects of a human being's wellbeing can be dramatically enhanced in such a short time frame, that an understanding of the potential of our bodies and minds to self correct themselves, is demonstrated,  we believe that such effects will not only deepen our appreciation of the potential for wellness that exists, but, would also inspire the greater dissemination of such approaches into medicine, such as is now starting to be seen in the "integrative medicine" movement.


How will it change the way an individual perceives oneself?

When a person is able to demonstrate to themselves such a dramatic improvement in their wellbeing, in their own sense of wellbeing that is both inspiring and empowering. Being empowered helps fuel commitment to continuing with such activities and efforts, to further explore the potential that exists within each of us.


Where will the study be conducted?

The SBTI study will be hosted at The Chopra Center for Wellbeing located on the property of OMNI La Costa Resort and Spa. 


What are we asking?

The Chopra Foundation is requesting your financial support of our study. 

We are very enthusiastic about this potentially paradigm-shifting study, which can potentially validate self-directed biological transformation and the effects on the health, quality and length of life and provide us clues on how to influence the wellbeing of future generations.  We hope you join us.

To find out more:  Email us at SBTI@chopra.com or call (760) 494-1663.

Resources Library:

Self -Directed Biological Transformation Initiative – A New Frontier ‘Consciousome’

Also read:

Big Idea 2014: You Will Transform Your Own Biology

The Best New Year's Resolution: Be Good To Your Genes

Radical Well Being: Where We Need to Go – Part 1

Radical Well Being: Where We Need to Go – Part 2

Perfect Health Programs

Perfect Health

Super Brain

Relaxation Response Induces Temporal Transcriptome Changes in Energy Metabolism, Insulin Secretion and Inflammatory Pathways.  Bhasin MK, Dusek JA, et al. (2013) Published in PLoS ONE 8(5): e62817. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0062817. 

Intensive meditation training, immune cell telomerase activity, and psychological mediators.  Jacobs, TL, Epel, ES, et al. Psychoneuroendocrinology (2011): 36, 664-681. 

Intensive Lifestyle Changes for Reversal of Coronary Heart Disease.  Ornish, Dean, et al.  Journal of the American Medical Assoc (JAMA).  December 16, 1998—Vol 280(23):  pg. 2001-2007.  

Rapid changes in histone deacetylases and inflammatory gene expression in expert meditators. Kaliman, P, et al.  Psychoneuroendocrinology (2014) 40, 96—107. 

Experienced Mindfulness Meditators Exhibit Higher Parietal-Occipital EEG Gamma Activity during NREM Sleep.  Ferrarelli, F, et al (2013) published in PLoS ONE 8(8): e73417. doi:10.1371/journal.pone.0073417.

Meditation and Health: The Search for Mechanisms of Action. Bethany E. Kok1*, Christian E. Waugh2, and Barbara L. Fredrickson


Lecture on SBTI by Deepak Chopra



About The Chopra Foundation

story:
A Super Passion

UB Real aims to be the leading trusted brand of protein superfood and supercare products designed for real life to help improve and protect human health and the environment. We have made it our mission to call others to be overcomers and be super. The good news is that we are providing whole food nutrients to help your body optimally thrive at its best. We spent nearly four years researching the most nutritionally dense superfoods that nature has to offer. Our findings led us to formulate a synergistic nutritional blend for you to enjoy wherever life takes you. UB Super is the fast and convenient way to consume the most nutritious meal of your day!

Super Fast Real Food!


Health Benefits:

  • Superior Immune System Support
  • Weight Loss
  • Energy Metabolism
  • Pre & Post Workout Recovery
  • Lean Muscle Mass


Why We Need Funding

We need your help in order to launch our retail distribution strategy. We will initially launch in the natural space with a focus on the Southeast region and then take it National. The $80,000 will help towards hiring brokers, marketing, distribution, and getting into retail stores. Your support and funding will help to begin the process to get UB Super into the hands of customers throughout the U.S. 



A Super Story of Overcoming

Founded in 2012, UB Real, LLC is the brainchild of Scott Kanyok, a self-described “regular guy” turned avid outdoorsman and entrepreneur.

With his 40th birthday on the horizon, our founder was determined to get into the best shape of his life.  This former financial advisor was working to restore his health after being sidelined with a chronic upper thoracic injury for the better part of six years. Through countless hours of physical therapy and rehabilitation, Scott worked himself into good enough shape to participate in long-distance bike rides. Little did he know that this activity that he loved so much would change his life forever.

On January 29, 2008, while partaking in a 40-mile bike ride, Scott was struck by a box truck. Thrown violently from his bike, Scott suffered a fractured skull with a subdural hematoma and multiple other compound fractures. While Scott was in the intensive care unit, his family was told that he might not make it. Several surgeries later, with his body held together with titanium plates and screws, Scott was in for the fight of his life.

With a severely compromised body and immune system, Scott knew he had to make serious changes on his road to recovery. He applied a relentless work ethic in all that he did, including extensive physical therapy, developing proper diet, supplementation and hygiene practices. Still, no matter how hard he tried, his weakened immune system caused him to develop constant upper respiratory infections for up to one month at a time.

Scott took an out-of-the-box approach to cleaning up his diet. He started experimenting with antioxidant-rich superfoods such as organic freeze dried acai, then maqui berry, camu camu and acerola cherry. Despite the improved diet, he still couldn’t shake his constant sickness – but he would not be deterred.

Needing to find a permanent solution to his ailments, Scott sought the help of a formulation expert and now friend, Jason Mitchell. Then the head of Research & Development at Country Life Vitamins, Jason was able to help connect several missing links in the formulation. After four years of exhaustive research, trial and error, Scott and Jason developed a synergistic nutritional formula that combines superfoods, protein, organic vitamins, fulvic minerals, prebiotics and probiotics. Incorporating this wonder shake into his daily routine, Scott finally emerged from sickness – and he hasn’t looked back since.

That formula became the idea behind UB Super – a protein superfood nutritional shake made from the highest quality real ingredients found in nature. Scott is living proof that superior nutrition can have a profound effect on your health, and he is the embodiment of the old adage “you are what you eat”. Today, Scott’s focus is creating superior nutrition and hygiene solutions for real life.


The Good Loop Promise

The Good Loop Promise starts with harvesting the highest quality source of ingredients that are eco-friendly, sustainable, and bioavailable while honoring the environment with recyclability, less deforestation and providing economic benefit for the indigenous people. We finish our promise by delivering to you a non-gmo, gluten free, superfood and eco-care products that will help reward your life with a peace of mind and many health benefits.



Partner with us to bring economic benefit for the indigenous people and many health benefits to UB Super customers. UB Super is making the world better for people and the planet every day. Please join us in this incredible mission to help others overcome.


UB Super Is Superfood Nutrition For Real Life

Let’s face it – real life is hectic. Between work and family commitments, you are always on the go. With that fast paced lifestyle, it is easy to give in to the bad nutritional choices that surround us. Thankfully, it no longer has to be that way. Now the fastest meal of your day can also be the most nutritious and guilt-free.

Your body requires real, whole food nutrients in order to optimally perform and thrive at its best. That’s exactly what you will get with each serving of UB Super. We spent nearly four years researching the most nutritionally dense superfoods that nature has to offer. Our findings led us to formulate a synergistic nutritional blend for you to enjoy wherever life takes you.

From protein and antioxidants to vitamins, minerals and digestive support, UB Super covers all of the nutritional bases in one convenient shake. Each serving of UB Super’s synergistic formula provides your body with:


INGREDIENTS & NUTRITION

Each serving of UB Super provides your body with:

●  10 nutritious superfoods (11 for chocolate flavor)

●  15g plant-based protein (16g for chocolate flavor)

●  complete amino acid profile

●  At least 100% daily intake 9 essential vitamins

●  antioxidants & fulvic minerals

●  prebiotics, probiotics & digestive enzymes

The premium ingredients found in UB Super are derived entirely from whole food sources – not synthesized in a lab. This provides you with the highest possible bioavailability. Our commitment to you is keeping it realTM in everything that we do.

non-gmo • gluten & soy free • no sugar added


The world’s most nutritious foods, all in one shake.


UB Super is packed with real, antioxidant rich superfoods from around the globe, including:

  • Organic Acai 
  • Organic Acerola
  • Camu Camu
  • Cupuacu
  • Organic Quinoa
  • Organic Hemp Seed
  • Organic Maqui Berry
  • Organic Mangosteen
  • Organic Noni
  • Organic Cacao (chocolate flavor)
  • Organic Chia Seed

story:
je suis aide soignante depuis 14 ans 

j'ai pris ma décision il y a 2 ans maintenant pour devenir INFIRMIÈRE j'ai préparer mon examen et j'ai réussie en mars 2013 mon établissement n'as pas pu me financier à 2 reprises (pour raison économique) et là c'est ma dernière chance. 
Je me suis inscrite à l'école pour faire ma rentrée en septembre j'ai pris une disponibilité pour concrétiser mon rêve et il y a 2 jours j'apprenais par l'école que je devais payer celle-ci à hauteur de 6200€ qui sont les frais de scolarité.
J'ai bien sur demandé partout et j'ai écumer des réponses négatives. ils me disent aussi qu'il y a que mon établissement  qui puisse me financer. (c'est le chien qui ce mort la queue) 
Je suis dans une situation délicate je peux rentrer à l'école mais à condition que je paye les frais de scolarité et actuellement je n'ai pas cette somme, le fait de m'aider à financer même un petit montant me permettrais d'avancer dans ce PROJET QUI ME TIENT A CŒUR.

story:
Glenn McGowan, Board President

Help us transform a vacant lot into a world-class soccer field and give north side youth the life- altering experience of organized soccer.

North Side Kids Want Soccer

North city youth have told us their interest in learning about and playing organized soccer which we believe will ultimately help them make friends and resolve differences, and improve self directedness and cooperativeness.

North Side Kids Need Soccer

Success in a team sport requires learning cooperation and responsible work toward a common goal.
”There are three ingredients for happiness - love, hope and faith. These ingredients are manifest in part in the character traits of self-directedness (the expression of hope in your life with clarity of goals and responsibility) and cooperativeness (an indication of how much you express love in your life.). A person with a high character trait of self directedness is responsible and goal-oriented. A person with a high character trait of cooperativeness is tolerant, compassionate."

-Robert Cloninger, MD Dept. of Psychiatry, Washington University, St. Louis.

We have the vision

There is a high demand for soccer fields in the City of St. Louis which is fifteen minutes from Ferguson, MO. Due to the high demand of soccer opportunities in the city's north side, The McGowan Foundation of St. Louis intends to bring this dream into reality.

We are ready

In the Fall of 2013, the McGowan Foundation signed a 10 year lease on a group of vacant lots in the vicinity of Powell Symphony Hall. In one week, we met with 4 soccer coaches and players of the Public High League. We registered over 60 boys (this is enough for 5 or 6 futsal teams) but couldn't get a place to play weekly. The demand for reserving soccer fields is so high that people camp out at the Parks Dept. headquarters annually in order to get the best fields in the best location. We have a solid board of directors that represents the community. We have an experienced and inspirational Director.

All we need is your support

Our goal is to raise enough money to purchase and develop this property into a futsal pitch that meets the standards of FIFA, the world governing body of soccer. Your generous donation will give these kids a great opportunity that will last a lifetime. With your support, we will turn these lots into a soccer field, and we’ll have boys and girls starting league play by the fall of 2014.

http://www.mcgowanfoundationofstlouis.org/ 

Austin Wibelmann, film editor, cinematographer, Andrew Evans,cinematographer

Karen Banks, narrator, renderings by Marla Martin

story:
Who We Are

HealthBridge has been working since 1982 in Asia, Africa and the Americas. We do pioneering research to identify and address critical gaps in achieving health and health equity in the developing world. 

We do this by working effectively with local partners in order to collect data, then deliver programs and affect local policy informed by the data we collected.  This is crucial to our approach, which looks to achieve lasting effect by learning respectfully from local practice, then helping build and institutionalize local capacity.  We strive to adhere to this very Canadian take on how to best make a difference in the world.

At the heart of our strategy is Prevention, rather than cure.  We are leaders at harnessing technology in an innovative manner to realize this strategy.

What We’ve Been Doing

HealthBridge is a leading edge deliverer of several innovative programs:

  • Reproductive, Maternal and Child Health (India, Vietnam)
  • Livable Cities (India, Sri Lanka, Vietnam, Bangladesh, India, Nepal, Niger)
  • Tobacco and Non-communicable Disease Control
  • Health, Nutrition and Food Security (South America, South East Asia, sub-Saharan Africa)

Your investment in this project will enable us to purchase 25 tablets and accessories for use in countries like Tanzania where we are fighting the problem of malaria and other diseases. To collect Smart Data, we train a group of 10-20 local field researchers to use this equipment . We've found that 20 people is a sweet spot where we can collect a lot of data quickly but keep the data collection consistent and coordinated. 

We use handheld devices to collect data in a variety of contexts – interviews with mothers of young children, health care workers and community leaders, as well as mapping anything from habitat for mosquitos that transmit diseases to the locations of vegetable stands. By using current technology, we ensure that the data we collect is of the highest quality. And we get it in real time! No trucks (driving over rutty, muddy roads) filled to the brim with paper surveys that then need to be entered manually on a computer followed by months of analysis. No.  We have the data as soon as there's a cell signal! Also we can take advantage of collecting GPS coordinates to see how problems vary in space. This is invaluable for designing solutions!

What Are We Planning Next

HealthBridge researchers have a number of programs in the works.  We rely on data to inform sound evidence-based decisions to maximise effect and limited resources.  With every decision, Executive Director Sian Fitzgerald and her team seek the optimum combination of three things:  the best bang for the buck, to create lasting effect and to leave a legacy of enduring local capacity so people can continue to help themselves.  Here’s a CBC news report featuring Sian that captures some of this complexity. 

So it’s critical to HealthBridge’s effectiveness that we have the right data. Usually this is not data that can be extrapolated and recycled from existing datasets.  We often need original, specialist, accurate and well-founded data that has to be sought out from those who we are trying to assist.  This means that HealthBridge researchers and their in-country partners are often out in the field, in austere environments, searching for and collecting high quality original base data. 

These data help our local partners do things like figure out better ways to: encourage people to sleep under mosquito nets and protect themselves from malaria; engage men in the health of their wives and children; or make it easier for the poor and vulnerable to access the things they need, like healthy food and health services.

Our data work is not easy to do, but it is so worthwhile.  It ensures that every HealthBridge program is as focused and effective as it can be. It goes without saying that having the right equipment is an important part of all this; we do, and we look after it.  But we need to upgrade the hardware every few years.  It gets beaten up in the field and we are constantly using and tweaking the latest software to stay close to the leading edge, where we can be most effective.   That’s where we need your help with this campaign.
  

Why Your Help Is Important

Using the same equipment for over 5 years by hundreds of people means it's pretty banged up now. Plus much more efficient technologies are currently available on the market. We hope to purchase 25 tablets and a similar number of protective cases, batteries and chargers by the end of this year. Here’s one of the cool things we will use this stuff for early next year as part of our Grand Challenges project in Tanzania. Help us continue to collect Smart Data with new equipment that will last at least another 5 years. 

Best of All

Best of all is the return we get from investing in collecting quality data and using it well.  That return is Smart Data.  It will continue delivering results much longer than a few years, and can be used to inform, benchmark and further target numerous studies and projects.  In that sense the bang for the buck is huge and the effect is exponentially greater (poor statistical analysis joke, but you get the idea).

story:
Hi,   my name is Angela   and this is a campaign to say Happy Birthday to someone who I love dearly and who I know is dearly loved by many.  Stephanie will be turning 25 on the 10th July, what a milestone!

About 4 weeks ago, Stephanie saved hard and bought herself a motorbike for her upcoming 25th Birthday (10th July).  Unfortunately, it was stolen last week and the insurance company has found a loop hole to avoid a payout which really, really sucks. 

I wanted to reach out to those around us to see if we could all help replace the stolen bike so that she can get a round and celebrate her 25th properly.  I thought this would be a nice way to say Happy Birthday myself and for everyone who loves Steph to give whatever they want to as their own way of saying Happy Birthday too! If you wanted to help celebrate Steph's birthday and give her something, this would be a great way to do it.

ABOUT THE BIKE.... This year steph took her full motorbike test (at a hefty fee of £1000!) , meaning she is eligible to ride any size bike, and carry passengers.  The bike in question was a Yamaha XJ6 Diversion (600cc) in a gorgeous midnight blue, and was her first big bike, costing £2500.  Insurance is around £500 plus there's extras necessary like a lock and chain.

I'm sure Steph will be starting to save again, but we all know how difficult that can be sometimes, so anything you can give would be immensely appreciated.  If you can't give, please share this with anyone who you think can and might!

Much love,

Angela

xx

story:
Faith created Cuddles for Cancer when she was just nine years old. After hearing that cancer patients often got cold during their treatments, Faith came up with the idea of making fleece blankets, hoping it would bring patients warmth, comfort and love. Since then, she has raised over $15,000 to help her make 700+ of her cuddle blankets. They have been sent all across Canada, the U.S. and to France, England and Australia. She has also created a signature ‘soldier’ blanket for her “Sponsor a Soldier” campaign for soldiers overseas and those suffering from injuries or Post Traumatic Stress Disorder, many of these blankets have been sent to Afghanistan and Kuwait. She recently launched a campaign called "Kids at Christmas", asking the community to sponsor a child to ensure every child admitted to her local hospital is given a cuddle blanket on Christmas Eve. In 2013, Faith also delivered 26 "cuddle" blankets to Toronto Sick Kids Hospital. On January 15th, 2014, Faith was awarded the Ontario Junior Citizen Award. She believes that you can never be too young to make a difference in the world. 

100% of funds donated go towards buying more fleece, so Faith can make more blankets.

Faith’s motto is “everyone deserves a cuddle”. Help her share her “cuddle” blankets!

THANK YOU for your support. <3

story:
Thank you everyone for your generous contributions!

Even once we reach our original goal, all proceeds will continue to go towards children in need!

Every $240 is another child who receives a reconstructive surgery


In Short

  • Operation Smile is an international organization whose goal is to provide Cleft lip/palate surgeries to individuals who would otherwise never have access to the care they need. They have the necessary infrastructure and resources to make this care a reality, which is why as a class we at the Vancouver College of Dental Hygiene have chosen to participate in this worldwide goal through fundraising.

Image from operationsmile.org
  • Who are we? We are the 2013-2015 class of the Vancouver College of Dental Hygiene and we are committed to promoting health in its most holistic meaning. This means physical and emotional health, both of which are compromised in an individual living with an orofacial deformity such as cleft lip/palate.
  • Why is your help important? 1 in 700 children worldwide are born with cleft lips/palates. Because the upper mid-line of the oral cavity isn't fused properly, this can cause problems with speech, infections and can lead to social ostracization.

Our Goal

Operation Smile breaks its donation scheme into blocks of 240$ per surgery.

  • What will you get for contributing? We are supplying perks at $15 increments which include snazzy buttons and our most heartfelt thanks.


Make an Impact

How often do you get the opportunity to really make a change in someone's life? By contributing, your donation will give a child access to better chances at employment, acceptance in their community and a sense of self-esteem they may never otherwise achieve.

  • Operation Smile is celebrating its 32nd year of providing reconstructive surgeries worldwide. You can trust that your donation will be put to good use.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially, never underestimate the value of knowledge. Share our campaign with your friends and family. Spread the word about Operation Smile. Change the world in little ways that can make a big difference.
